word: هَٰذَا
translation: This

word: قَالُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي رُزِقۡنَا مِن قَبۡلُۖ
translation: They will say, “This is what we were provided with before,”

word: مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلٗاۘ
translation: “What did Allah intend by this example?”

word: فَهَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡبَعۡثِ
translation: This is the Day of Resurrection

word: ذَٰلِكَ
translation: That

word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ
translation: This (that) is the Book in which there is no doubt

word: وَمَا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّون
translation: Of that they have no knowledge; they are only assuming.

word: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَوۡمٌ عَسِيرٌ
translation: That Day will be a difficult day.

word: هَٰذِهِ
translation: This

word: وَلَا تَقۡرَبَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةَ
translation: but do not approach this tree

word: لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۚ
translation: For those who do good in this world, is goodness.

word: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ
translation: “This is a she-camel; she has her turn of drinking,”

word: تِلۡكَ
translation: That

word: تِلۡكَ أُمَّةٞ قَدۡ خَلَتۡۖ
translation: That was a nation that has passed on;

word: وَتِلۡكَ حُجَّتُنَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦۚ
translation: That was Our argument which We gave to Abraham against his people.

word: هَٰٓؤُلَآء
translation: These

word: وَجِئۡنَا بِكَ عَلَىٰ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ شَهِيدٗا
translation: And We bring you as a witness against these?

word: لِّيَقُولُوٓاْ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم
translation: “Are these the ones whom Allah has favored from among us?”

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ
translation: Those

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
translation: Those are upon [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.

word: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَأَنَا ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
translation: Those—I will accept their repentance. I am the Acceptor of Repentance, the Merciful.

word: ٱلَّذِي
translation: He who

word: مَثَلُهُمۡ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَوۡقَدَ نَارٗا
translation: Their likeness is that of a person who kindled a fire;

word: أَوۡ كَٱلَّذِي مَرَّ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٖ
translation: Or like him who passed by a town

word: ءَامِنُواْ بِٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ
translation: Believe in that which was revealed to the believers

word: ٱلَّتِي
translation: She who

word: وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
translation: And guard yourselves against the Fire that is prepared for the disbelievers.

word: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
translation: Repel evil by what is better. We are aware of what they describe.

word: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّتِي نَقَضَتۡ غَزۡلَهَا
translation: And do not be like her who untwisted her spun thread,

word: ٱلَّذِينَ
translation: Those who

word: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
translation: The path of those whom You have blessed,

word: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُواْ
translation: And do not be like those who became divided

word: فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُم
translation: but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

word: ٱلَّتِي
translation: Those who

word: وَيَضَعُ عَنۡهُمۡ إِصۡرَهُمۡ وَٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلَ ٱلَّتِي كَانَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ
translation: and relieves them of their burden and the shackles which were upon zthem.

word: فَمَآ أَغۡنَتۡ عَنۡهُمۡ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِي يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
translation: And they were not availed at all by their gods which they invoked other than Allah.

word: هَٰذِهِ
translation: These

word: وَقَالُواْ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَنۡعَٰمٞ وَحَرۡثٌ حِجۡرٞ لَّا يَطۡعَمُهَآ إِلَّا مَن نَّشَآءُ بِزَعۡمِهِمۡ
translation: «And they say, “These animals and crops are forbidden; no one may eat from them except whom we will,” by their claim.

word: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ
translation: «When he said to his father and his people, “What are these statues to which you are devoted?”(52)»

word: تِلۡكَ
translation: Those

word: تِلۡكَ أَمَانِيُّهُمۡۗ
translation: Those are their wishes.

word: تِلۡكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: Those are the bounds set by Allah.

word: نَعَمۡ
translation: Yes

word: فَهَلۡ وَجَدتُّم مَّا وَعَدَ رَبُّكُمۡ حَقّٗاۖ قَالُواْ نَعَمۡ
translation: “Did you find what your Lord promised you to be true?” They will say, “Yes.”

word: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ
translation: He said, “Yes, and you will be among my favorites.”

word: بَلَي
translation: Yes, indeed

word: بَلَىٰۚ مَن كَسَبَ سَيِّئَةٗ وَأَحَٰطَتۡ بِهِۦ خَطِيٓـَٔتُهُ
translation: Yes Indeed, whoever commits misdeeds, and becomes besieged by his iniquities—

word: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ وَجۡهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ
translation: Indeed, whoever submits his face in Islam to Allah while being a doer of good

word: كَلَّا
translation: Certainly not

word: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ
translation: No indeed! We will write what he says,

word: كَلَّآۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَاۖ
translation: Certainly not! It is just a word he is saying.

word: إِلَّا
translation: Except

word: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُۚ
translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of [all] existence.

word: مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَشۡفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِ
translation: Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His permission?

word: إِنۡ .. إِلَّا
translation: Nothing but

word: ثُمَّ جَآءُوكَ يَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَدۡنَآ إِلَّآ إِحۡسَٰنٗا وَتَوۡفِيقًا
translation: We intended nothing but good conduct and accommodation.

word: إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
translation: “This is nothing but plain magic.”

word: مَا .. إِلَّا
translation: Nothing but

word: مَا قُلۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِلَّا مَآ أَمَرۡتَنِي بِهِۦ
translation: I said not to them except what You commanded me

word: فَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ
translation: But the notables of his people, who disbelieved, said, “This is nothing but a human like you,”

word: أَلَّا
translation: So as not to/ that not

word: إِنِ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ أَمَرَ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِيَّاهُۚ
translation: He has commanded that you worship none but Him.

word: وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ
translation: And why should we not rely upon Allah

word: لَا
translation: Do(es) not

word: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ
translation: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

word: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ
translation: That neither nourishes, nor satisfies hunger.

word: مَا
translation: Not (continuous)

word: يُخَٰدِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَمَا يَخۡدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ
translation: They seek to deceive Allah and those who believe, but they deceive none but themselves,

word: وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ كَفَرُواْ
translation: Solomon disbelieved not, but the Satans disbelieved,

word: لَنۡ
translation: Will not

word: قَالَ لَنۡ أُرۡسِلَهُۥ مَعَكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ تُؤۡتُونِ مَوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ
translation: He said, “I will not send him with you, unless you give me a pledge before Allah”

word: فَلَنۡ أَبۡرَحَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡذَنَ لِيٓ أَبِيٓ
translation: I will not leave this land until my father permits me,

word: لَمۡ
translation: Did not

word: وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُم مَّا لَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: and teach you the Book and the wisdom, and teaching you that which you did not know;

word: وَنَحۡنُ أَحَقُّ بِٱلۡمُلۡكِ مِنۡهُ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡتَ سَعَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡمَالِۚ
translation: when we are more worthy of authority than he, and he was not given plenty of wealth?”

word: لَيۡسَ
translation: (There is) no

word: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ
translation: For them, there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

word: لَّيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتًا غَيۡرَ مَسۡكُونَةٖ
translation: There is no blame on you for entering uninhabited houses,

word: لَيۡسَت
translation: (There is) no

word: وَقَالَتِ ٱلۡيَهُودُ لَيۡسَتِ ٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ
translation: The Jews say, “The Christians are not based on anything;”

word: غَيۡر
translation: Other than

word: مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ
translation: what deity other than Allah could bring you light?

word: غَيۡر
translation: not

word: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غَيۡرِ ٱلۡمَغۡضُوبِ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
translation: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.

word: مِن دُون
translation: Apart from

word: وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ
translation: and apart from Allah you have no protector or helper?

word: وَقَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱتَّخَذۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا
translation: And [Abraham] said, “You have only taken, apart from Allah, idols”

word: أَ
translation: Yes/ no Questions

word: أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقۡسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمَعَكُمۡۚ
translation: Are these the ones who swore by Allah most earnest oaths that they were with you?

word: أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَذۡكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ
translation: Is this the one who insults your gods?

word: ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
translation: Are separate lords better or Allah, the One, the Prevailing?

word: هَلۡ
translation: Yes/ no Questions

word: يَقُولُونَ هَل لَّنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ مِن شَيۡءٖۗ
translation: saying, "Is there anything for us [to have done] in this matter?"

word: وَيَصُدَّكُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَعَنِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّنتَهُونَ
translation: and to prevent you from the remembrance of Allah, and from prayer. Will you not desist?

word: مَا
translation: What (question word)

word: قَالَ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَلَّا تَسۡجُدَ إِذۡ أَمَرۡتُكَۖ
translation: He said, “What prevented you from prostrating when I have commanded you?”

word: مَاذا
translation: What ...?

word: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ
translation: “He wants to evict you from your land, so what do you recommend?”

word: فَأَلۡقِهۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَٱنظُرۡ مَاذَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
translation: and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what [answer] they will return.

word: لِمَ
translation: Why…?

word: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ
translation: He said, “O my people, why are you quick to do evil rather than good?”

word: وَقَالُواْ لِجُلُودِهِمۡ لِمَ شَهِدتُّمۡ عَلَيۡنَاۖ
translation: And they will say to their skins, “Why did you testify against us?”

word: مَنۡ
translation: Who...?

word: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡلٗا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا
translation: And who is better in speech than someone who calls to Allah, and acts with integrity,

word: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ
translation: And if you ask them, “Who created the heavens and the earth?”

word: مَتَى
translation: When ...?

word: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
translation: And they say, “When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?”

word: فَسَيُنۡغِضُونَ إِلَيۡكَ رُءُوسَهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هُوَۖ
translation: Then they will nod their heads at you, and say, “When will it be?”

word: أَيۡنَ
translation: Where...?

word: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ
translation: On the Day when He will call to them, and say, “Where are My associates whom you used to claim?”

word: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ
translation: And it will be said to them, “Where are those you used to worship?”

word: كَيۡفَ
translation: How...?

word: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ
translation: Have they not seen how Allah begins creation and then repeats it?

word: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ بَدَأَ ٱلۡخَلۡقَۚ
translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how He began creation.”

word: كَمۡ
translation: How many/ much?

word: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ
translation: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them?

word: وَكَمۡ قَصَمۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٖ كَانَتۡ ظَالِمَةٗ
translation: How many a guilty town have We crushed,

word: أَيُّ
translation: Which?

word: قُلۡ أَيُّ شَيۡءٍ أَكۡبَرُ شَهَٰدَةٗۖ
translation: Say, "What thing is greatest in testimony?"

word: فَأَيُّ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ أَحَقُّ بِٱلۡأَمۡنِۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: So which of the two parties has more right to security, if you should know?

word: أنَّى
translation: How...?

word: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
translation: That is Allah. So how could you deviate?

word: أنَّى
translation: From Where..?

word: أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُۥ وَلَدٞ وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ صَٰحِبَةٞۖ
translation: How can He have a son when He never had a companion?

word: فَوۡق
translation: Above/ on/ over

word: إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰنِيٓ أَحۡمِلُ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِي خُبۡزٗا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِنۡهُۖ
translation: "Indeed, I have seen myself [in a dream] carrying on my head [some] bread, from which the birds were eating.”

word: وَجَاعِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوكَ فَوۡقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۖ
translation: and hold those who follow you above those who disbelieve till the Day of Resurrection.

word: وَرَفَعَ بَعۡضَكُمۡ فَوۡقَ بَعۡضٖ دَرَجَٰتٖ لِّيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ فِي مَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمۡۗ
translation: and exalted some in rank over others in order to try you by what He has given you.

word: تَحۡت
translation: Under(neath)/ beneath

word: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلۡقَادِرُ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَبۡعَثَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابٗا مِّن فَوۡقِكُمۡ أَوۡ مِن تَحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِكُمۡ
translation: Say, “He is Able to send upon you an affliction, from above you, or from under your feet.

word: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا
translation: Whereupon he called her from beneath her: “Do not worry; your Lord has placed a stream beneath you.”

word: يَمِين
translation: Right (hand)

word: لَقَدۡ كَانَ لِسَبَإٖ فِي مَسۡكَنِهِمۡ ءَايَةٞۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٖ وَشِمَالٖۖ
translation: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left.

word: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
translation: They will say, “You used to come at us from the right.”

word: وَ مَا تِلۡكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ
translation: And what is that in your right-hand, O Moses?”

word: شِمَال
translation: Left (hand)

word: لَقَدۡ كَانَ لِسَبَإٖ فِي مَسۡكَنِهِمۡ ءَايَةٞۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٖ وَ شِمَالٖۖ
translation: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left.

word: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ
translation: As the two receivers receive, seated to the right and to the left.

word: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ مَآ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ
translation: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

word: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالـِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ
translation: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say,

word: بَيۡن
translation: Between/ Among

word: كَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةَۢ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡأَغۡنِيَآءِ مِنكُمۡۚ
translation: so that it may not circulate solely between the wealthy among you.

word: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
translation: To Him belongs everything in the heavens and the earth, and everything between them, and everything beneath the soil.

word: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
translation: Issuing from between the backbone and the breastbones.

word: بَيۡن يَدَي
translation: Before (place/ time)

word: مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَهُدٗى وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
translation: Confirming that which was before it, and as guidance and good tidings for the believers.

word: بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِي
translation: Before (place/ time)

word: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ
translation: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them,

word: خَلۡف
translation: Behind

word: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ
translation: He knows what is in front of them and what is behind them;

word: خَلۡف
translation: Successor

word: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ
translation: Today We will preserve your body, so that you become a sign for those after you.

word: وَرَاء
translation: Behind

word: وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ
translation: And when you ask his wives for something, ask them from behind a screen;

word: وَرَاء
translation: Beyond (after)

word: فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَ مِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
translation: And We gave her good news of Isaac; and after Isaac, Jacob.

word: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
translation: But whoever seeks anything beyond that—these are the transgressors.

word: حَوۡل
translation: (A)round

word: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡۚ
translation: And you will see the angels hovering around the Throne, glorifying their Lord with praise.

word: وَلِتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَـهَاۚ
translation: that you may warn the Central City and whoever is around it,

word: وَصِيَّةٗ لِّأَزۡوَٰجِهِم مَّتَٰعًا إِلَى ٱلۡحَوۡلِ غَيۡرَ إِخۡرَاجٖۚ
translation: For their wives is a bequest: maintenance for one year without turning [them] out.

word: حَيۡثُ
translation: Wherever

word: وَٱقۡتُلُوهُمۡ حَيۡثُ ثَقِفۡتُمُوهُمۡ وَأَخۡرِجُوهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ أَخۡرَجُوكُمۡۚ
translation: And kill them wherever you overtake them, and expel them from where they had expelled you.

word: وَحَيۡثُ مَا كُنتُمۡ فَوَلُّواْ وُجُوهَكُمۡ شَطۡرَهُۥۗ
translation: And wherever you may be, turn your faces towards it.

word: أَيۡنَمَا
translation: Wherever

word: أَيۡنَمَا تَكُونُواْ يُدۡرِككُّمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ وَلَوۡ كُنتُمۡ فِي بُرُوجٖ مُّشَيَّدَةٖۗ
translation: Wherever you may be, death will catch up with you, even if you were in fortified towers.

word: فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّواْ فَثَمَّ وَجۡهُ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: So wherever you [might] turn, there is the Face of Allah.

word: بـِـ
translation: In

word: بِـسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
translation: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

word: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَأَخِيهِ أَن تَبَوَّءَا لِقَوۡمِكُمَا بِـمِصۡرَ بُيُوتٗا
translation: And We inspired to Moses and his brother, “Settle your people in Egypt in houses and make your houses”

word: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ
translation: And those who believe in what was revealed to you,

word: عَنۡ
translation: (away) From/ about

word: فَمَا لَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلتَّذۡكِرَةِ مُعۡرِضِينَ
translation: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

word: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنّـِي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ
translation: And when My servants ask you about Me, I Am near;

word: فِي
translation: In/ during

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ وَفِي ٱلنَّارِ هُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ
translation: [For] those, their deeds have become worthless, and in the Fire they will abide eternally.

word: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ
translation: And fight in the way/cause of Allah those who fight you,

word: فَمَن لَّمۡ يَجِدۡ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَٰثَةِ أَيَّامٖ فِي ٱلۡحَجِّ
translation: But if he lacks the means, then fasting for three days during the Hajj

word: كَــ
translation: As/ like

word: كَـذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
translation: Such is the retribution of the disbelievers.

word: وَإِنَّ يَوۡمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَـأَلۡفِ سَنَةٖ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
translation: A day with your Lord is like a thousand years of your count.

word: لـ
translation: For (belongs to)

word: لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُحۡصِرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
translation: It is for the poor; those who are restrained in the way of Allah,

word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: This is the Book in which there is no doubt, a guide for the righteous.

word: مِنۡ
translation: from

word: وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ حَسَنَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۖ
translation: When a good fortune comes their way, they say, “This is from Allah.”

word: وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ
translation: And recall that We delivered you from the people of Pharaoh.

word: إِلَى
translation: (to)wards

word: وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَشَدِّ ٱلۡعَذَابِۗ
translation: And on the Day of Resurrection, they will be assigned to the most severe torment.

word: يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
translation: He guides whom He wills to a straight path.

word: حَتَّى
translation: Until

word: وَلَا تَحۡلِقُواْ رُءُوسَكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡهَدۡيُ مَحِلَّهُۥ
translation: And do not shave your heads until the offering has reached its destination.

word: لَن تَنَالُواْ ٱلۡبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُواْ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَۚ
translation: Never will you attain the good [reward] until you spend [in the way of Allah] from that which you love.

word: عَلَى
translation: On/ upon/ over

word: ثُمَّ ٱجۡعَلۡ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٖ مِّنۡهُنَّ جُزۡءٗا
translation: Then [after slaughtering them] put on each hill a portion of them;

word: وَلِلَّهِ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ حِجُّ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَاعَ إِلَيۡهِ سَبِيلٗاۚ
translation: Pilgrimage to the House is a duty to Allah on all who can make the journey.

word: وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
translation: “When Allah is a witness over what you do?”

word: مَعَ
translation: With

word: رَبَّنَا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرۡ عَنَّا سَيِّـَٔاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ
translation: Our Lord, so forgive us our sins and remove from us our misdeeds and cause us to die with the righteous.

word: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ
translation: therefore, record us among the witnesses of the truth.”

word: وَ
translation: And/ by (swear by)

word: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ ١ وَطُورِ سِينِينَ ٢
translation: By the fig and the olive, (1) And [by] Mount Sinai,

word: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ
translation: Except those who accepted faith and did good deeds –

word: إِنَّ
translation: Verily/ truly

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
translation: Verily Allah is Able to do all things.

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦٓ أَن يَضۡرِبَ مَثَلٗا مَّا بَعُوضَةٗ فَمَا فَوۡقَهَاۚ
translation: Verily, Allah is not ashamed to set forth a parable even of a mosquito or so much more when it is bigger than it.

word: أَنَّ
translation: That (+nouns)

word: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
translation: Do they not know that Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal?

word: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
translation: Do you not know that Allah is capable of all things?

word: إِنۡ
translation: If

word: فَإِنۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِمِثۡلِ مَآ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ فَقَدِ ٱهۡتَدَواْۖ
translation: So if they believe in the same as you believe in, then they have been [rightly] guided;

word: فَمَن يَمۡلِكُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔا إِنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡمَسِيحَ
translation: “Then who could prevent Allah at all if He had intended to destroy Christ, the son of Mary,”

word: لَئِن
translation: If

word: لَئِنۢ بَسَطتَ إِلَيَّ يَدَكَ لِتَقۡتُلَنِي مَآ أَنَا۠ بِبَاسِطٖ يَدِيَ إِلَيۡكَ لِأَقۡتُلَكَۖ
translation: “If you extend your hand to kill me, I will not extend my hand to kill you;

word: أَنۡ
translation: to (in order to)/That (+verbs)

word: قَالَ يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰٓ أَعَجَزۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِثۡلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡغُرَابِ
translation: He said, “O woe to me! Have I failed to be like this crow-?”

word: قَالَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ مَا يَكُونُ لِيٓ أَنۡ أَقُولَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِحَقٍّۚ
translation: He will say, “Glory be to You! It is not for me to say what I have no right to.

word: كأَنَّ
translation: As if

word: وَلَّىٰ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَا كَأَنَّ فِيٓ أُذُنَيۡهِ وَقۡرٗاۖ
translation: he turns away in pride, as though he did not hear them, as though there is deafness in his ears.

word: وَإِذۡ نَتَقۡنَا ٱلۡجَبَلَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٞ
translation: And [mention] when We raised the mountain above them as if it was a dark cloud

word: لَكِن
translation: But

word: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ
translation: In fact, it is they who are the corrupters, but they are not aware.

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
translation: Verily, Allah is Gracious towards the people, but most people are not appreciative.

word: لَمَّا
translation: When

word: فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥ قَالَ أَعۡلَمُ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
translation: So when it became clear to him, he said, “I know that Allah has power over all things.”

word: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ
translation: They denied the truth when it has come to them;

word: لَوۡ
translation: If

word: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۚ
translation: And if Allah had willed, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight.

word: وَلَوۡ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَلَكٗا لَّجَعَلۡنَٰهُ رَجُلٗا
translation: And if We had made him an angel, We would have made him a man,

word: لَوۡلَا
translation: But for/ why not

word: فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
translation: And Were it not for Allah’s grace and mercy towards you, you would have been among the losers.

word: وَلَوۡلَا دَفۡعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعۡضَهُم بِبَعۡضٖ لَّفَسَدَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ
translation: And if it were not for Allah checking [some] people by means of others, the earth would have been corrupted,

word: لَوۡلَا
translation: why .. not

word: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَتۡ سُورَةٞۖ
translation: Those who believe say, "Why has a surah not been sent down?

word: قَبۡل (مِنۡ)
translation: Before

word: أَمۡ تُرِيدُونَ أَن تَسۡـَٔلُواْ رَسُولَكُمۡ كَمَا سُئِلَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۗ
translation: Or do you want to question your Messenger as Moses was questioned before?

word: وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ غُرُوبِهَاۖ
translation: And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun, and before its setting.

word: (مِنۡ) بَعۡد
translation: After

word: ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ
translation: Then you took [for worship] the calf after him, while you were wrongdoers.

word: وَلَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتَ أَهۡوَآءَهُم بَعۡدَ ٱلَّذِي جَآءَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ
translation: And if you should follow their inclinations after what has come to you of knowledge,

word: إِذۡ
translation: When (for past)

word: وَ إِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ
translation: And recall when We appointed for Moses forty nights. Then you took [for worship] the calf after him,

word: وَ إِذۡ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡبَيۡتَ مَثَابَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَأَمۡنٗا
translation: And when We made the House a place of return for the people,

word: إِذَا
translation: When

word: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَٰبَتۡهُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّآ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ
translation: Those who, when a calamity afflicts them, say, “To Allah we belong, and to Him we will return.”

word: وَ إِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ
translation: And when My servants ask you about Me, I Am near;

word: ثُمَّ
translation: (for present/future)

word: وَإِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ
translation: And recall when We appointed for Moses forty nights. Then you took [for worship] the calf after him,

word: فَأَمَاتَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِاْئَةَ عَامٖ ثُمَّ بَعَثَهُۥۖ
translation: So Allah caused him to die for a hundred years; then He revived him.

word: فَــ
translation: Then (directly after)/so

word: قَالَ أَنَّىٰ يُحۡيِۦ هَٰذِهِ ٱللَّهُ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۖ فَأَمَاتَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِاْئَةَ عَامٖ
translation: He said, “How can Allah revive this after its demise?” So Allah caused him to die for a hundred years;

word: قَالَ فَخُذۡ أَرۡبَعَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلطَّيۡرِ
translation: He said, “Then take four birds,…”

word: ذُو
translation: Of (belonging to)

word: وَٱللَّهُ يَخۡتَصُّ بِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
translation: But Allah chooses for His mercy whomever He wills. Allah is Possessor of Sublime Grace.

word: ذَا
translation: Of (belonging to)

word: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
translation: And give those of kinship his rights, and the poor, and the wayfarer,

word: ذِي
translation: Of (belonging to)

word: إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا
translation: they would have sought a way to the Lord of the Throne.

word: ذَات
translation: Of (belonging to)

word: وَءَاوَيۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبۡوَةٖ ذَاتِ قَرَارٖ وَمَعِينٖ
translation: and We sheltered them on high ground with security and flowing springs.

word: أُولُواْ
translation: Of (belonging to)

word: وَلَا يَأۡتَلِ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡفَضۡلِ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلسَّعَةِ أَن يُؤۡتُوٓاْ
translation: Those of you who have affluence and means should not refuse to give

word: أُولِي
translation: Of (belonging to)

word: أَن يُؤۡتُوٓاْ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينَ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ
translation: to give to the relatives, and the needy, and the emigrants for the sake of Allah.

word: أَهۡل
translation: Family/ People of

word: مَّا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَلَا ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
translation: It is never the wish of the disbelievers from among the People of the Book, nor of the polytheists,

word: وَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ شِقَاقَ بَيۡنِهِمَا فَٱبۡعَثُواْ حَكَمٗا مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَحَكَمٗا مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَآ
translation: If you fear a breach between the two, appoint an arbiter from his family and an arbiter from her family.

word: ءَالِ
translation: Family/ people of

word: وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
translation: And recall when We delivered you from the people of Pharaoh. They inflicted on you terrible persecution,

word: وَيُتِمُّ نِعۡمَتَهُۥ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَ كَمَآ أَتَمَّهَا
translation: and will complete His blessing upon you and upon the family of Jacob,

word: أَلَا
translation: Lo!

word: أَلَا بِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطۡمَئِنُّ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ
translation: Lo! in the remembrance of Allah hearts do find rest.

word: أَلَا
translation: Will/ do .. not ?

word: أَيُمۡسِكُهُۥ عَلَىٰ هُونٍ أَمۡ يَدُسُّهُۥ فِي ٱلتُّرَابِۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ
translation: shall he keep it with ignominy or bury it in the dust! Unquestionably, vile is that which they judge!

word: أَلَا تُحِبُّونَ أَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۚ
translation: Do you not love for Allah to pardon you?

word: نِعۡمَ
translation: What a good … !

word: إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَٰهُ صَابِرٗاۚ نِّعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٞ
translation: We found him patient. What an excellent servant! He was obedient.

word: وَلَقَدۡ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٞ فَلَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡمُجِيبُونَ
translation: And Noah called out to Us, and We are the Best of responders.

word: بِئۡسَ
translation: What a foul/ bad ..!

word: ثُمَّ أَضۡطَرُّهُۥٓ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ ٱلنَّارِۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
translation: then I will consign him to the punishment of the Fire; how miserable the destiny!”

word: فَحَسۡبُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
translation: Sufficient for him is Hellfire, and how wretched is the resting place.

word: مِثۡل
translation: Like

word: وَلَهُنَّ مِثۡلُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَيۡهِنَّ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۚ
translation: And due to the wives is similar to what is expected of them, according to what is reasonable.

word: مَثَل
translation: Example

word: مَثَلُهُمۡ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَوۡقَدَ نَارٗا فَلَمَّآ أَضَآءَتۡ مَا حَوۡلَهُۥ
translation: Their likeness is like that of a person who kindled a fire; when it illuminated all around him,

word: أو
translation: Or

word: أَوۡ كَصَيِّبٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَٰتٞ وَرَعۡدٞ وَبَرۡقٞ
translation: Or like a rainstorm from the sky, in which is darkness, and thunder, and lightning.

word: ثُمَّ قَسَتۡ قُلُوبُكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَهِيَ كَٱلۡحِجَارَةِ أَوۡ أَشَدُّ قَسۡوَةٗۚ
translation: Then after that your hearts hardened. They were as rocks, or even harder.

word: أم
translation: Or ?

word: أَمۡ تَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: or are you saying about Allah what you do not know?”

word: أَمۡ تُرِيدُونَ أَن تَسۡـَٔلُواْ رَسُولَكُمۡ كَمَا سُئِلَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۗ
translation: Or do you want to question your Messenger as Moses was questioned before?

word: بَعۡض
translation: Some/ part (of)

word: فَقُلۡنَا ٱضۡرِبُوهُ بِبَعۡضِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُحۡيِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
translation: We said, “Strike him with part of it. Thus does Allah bring the dead to life,

word: قَالَ لَبِثۡتُ يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖۖ
translation: He said, “I have tarried for a day, or part of a day.”

word: كُل
translation: Every/ each

word: قَالَ أَعۡلَمُ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
translation: he said, “I know that Allah has power over all things.”

word: ثُمَّ ٱجۡعَلۡ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٖ مِّنۡهُنَّ جُزۡءٗا
translation: then place a part on each hill,

word: لَعَلَّ
translation: Perhaps/ may

word: وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا
translation: And what may make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near.

word: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
translation: And obey Allah and the Messenger, that you may obtain mercy.

word: عَسَى
translation: Possibly/ may

word: وَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تَكۡرَهُواْ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡۖ
translation: But it may be that you dislike something while it is good for you,

word: وَعَسَىٰٓ أَن تُحِبُّواْ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُوَ شَرّٞ لَّكُمۡۚ
translation: and it may be that you like something while it is bad for you.

word: يا (أَيُّهَا)
translation: O!

word: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّكُمۡ ظَلَمۡتُمۡ أَنفُسَكُم بِٱتِّخَاذِكُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ
translation: “O my people, you have done wrong to yourselves by worshiping the calf.”

word: وَإِذۡ قُلۡتُمۡ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ نَرَى ٱللَّهَ جَهۡرَةٗ
translation: And [recall] when you said, “O Moses, we will never believe you unless we see Allah outright.”

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَقُولُواْ رَٰعِنَا
translation: O you who have believed, say not [to Allah's Messenger], "Ra'ina"

word: عِنۡد
translation: At/ with/ from

word: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ
translation: They have different ranks with Allah,…

word: لَدى
translation: At/ with/ from

word: إِذِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلۡحَنَاجِرِ كَٰظِمِينَۚ
translation: when the hearts are at the throats, choking them.

word: لَدُن
translation: At/ with/ from

word: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
translation: And then We would have given them from Us a great reward.

word: مَا
translation: Not (negation)

word: وَمَا يَخۡدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ
translation: but they deceive not except themselves

word: وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
translation: They did not wrong Us, but they were [only] wronging themselves.

word: مَا
translation: What (question word)

word: قَالَ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَلَّا تَسۡجُدَ إِذۡ أَمَرۡتُكَۖ
translation: He said, “What prevented you from prostrating when I have commanded you?”

word: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ
translation: He said, “O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray.”

word: مَا
translation: Which/ that (Relative pronoun)

word: مَثَلُهُمۡ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَوۡقَدَ نَارٗا فَلَمَّآ أَضَآءَتۡ مَا حَوۡلَهُۥ
translation: Their example is like that of one who kindled a fire; and when it lit up all that was around it,

word: وَنَزَعۡنَا مَا فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنۡ غِلّٖ
translation: And We will have removed whatever is within their breasts of resentment,

word: بِـ + مَا
translation: (with)

word: بِمَا
translation: With which

word: إِنَّهُۥ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
translation: He is fully Informed of what you do.

word: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ
translation: He said, “My Lord, with what you have favored me, I will not be…”

word: بِمَ
translation: With what?

word: فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
translation: “What good news do you bring?”

word: فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
translation: and will see what [reply] the messengers will return."

word: عَن + مَا
translation: (about)

word: عَمَّا
translation: About which?

word: وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا يَعۡمَلُونَ
translation: and your Lord is not unaware of what they do.

word: وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
translation: and they will surely be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about what they used to invent.

word: عَمَّ
translation: About what?

word: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: What are they asking one another about?

word: فِي + مَا
translation: (in)

word: فِيمَا
translation: In which

word: لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِ فِيمَا ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِيهِۚ
translation: to judge between people regarding their differences.

word: جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَا ءَاتَىٰهُمَاۚ
translation: they attribute partners to Him in what He has given them.

word: فِيمَ
translation: In what?

word: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكۡرَىٰهَآ
translation: In what (position) are you that you should mention it?

word: قَالُواْ فِيمَ كُنتُمۡۖ
translation: they will say, “What was the matter with you?”

word: مِن + مَا
translation: (from)

word: مِمَا
translation: From which

word: وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
translation: and give from what We have provided for them.

word: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ
translation: So consume from what you have gained, lawful and good

word: مِمَ
translation: From what?

word: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
translation: So let man observe from what he was created.

word: لِـ + مَا
translation: (for)

word: لِمَا
translation: To/ for which

word: جَآءَكُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّصَدِّقٞ لِّمَا مَعَكُمۡ
translation: should a messenger come to you verifying what you have,

word: مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِۖ
translation: “And verifying what lies before me of the Torah,”

word: لِمَ
translation: For what? Why?

word: قُلۡ فَلِمَ تَقۡتُلُونَ أَنۢبِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ
translation: Say, “Why did you kill Allah’s prophets”

word: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تُحَآجُّونَ فِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ
translation: O People of the Book! Why do you argue about Abraham,

word: كَـ + مَا
translation: (like)

word: كَمَا
translation: Just like

word: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَعۡرِفُونَهُۥ كَمَا يَعۡرِفُونَ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡۖ
translation: Those to whom We have given the Book recognize it as they recognize their own children.

word: وَلَقَدۡ جِئۡتُمُونَا فُرَٰدَىٰ كَمَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖ
translation: “You have come to Us individually, just as We created you the first time,…”

word: إِنَّ + مَا
translation: (verily)

word: إنَّمَا
translation: Verily is

word: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ
translation: Say, “Verily miracles are only with Allah,…”

word: أَن تَقُولُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا أُنزِلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ عَلَىٰ طَآئِفَتَيۡنِ مِن قَبۡلِنَا
translation: Lest you say, “Verily, The Scripture was revealed to two parties before us,…”

word: أَنَّ + مَا
translation: (that)

word: أَنَّما
translation: That

word: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّما أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ
translation: And know that your possessions and your children are a test,

word: وَلِيَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ
translation: and that they may know that He is but one God

word: كَأَنَّ + مَا
translation: (as if)

word: كَأَنَّمَا
translation: As if

word: مَّا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِمٖۖ كَأَنَّمَا أُغۡشِيَتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ قِطَعٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مُظۡلِمًاۚ
translation: They will have from Allah no protector. It will be as if their faces are covered with pieces of the night - so dark [are they].

word: كَأَنَّمَا يَصَّعَّدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِۚ
translation: as though he were climbing up the sky.

word: كُلَّ + مَا
translation: (every)

word: كُلَّمَا
translation: Every time Whenever

word: كُلَّمَا دَخَلَتۡ أُمَّةٞ لَّعَنَتۡ أُخۡتَهَاۖ
translation: Every time a nation enters, it will curse its sister.

word: وَيَصۡنَعُ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ وَكُلَّمَا مَرَّ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَأٞ مِّن قَوۡمِهِۦ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُۚ
translation: As he was building the ark, and whenever some of his people passed by him, they ridiculed him.

word: أَيۡنَ + مَا
translation: (where)

word: أَيۡنَمَا
translation: Wherever

word: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ
translation: They are cursed; wherever they are found,

word: فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّواْ فَثَمَّ وَجۡهُ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: So wherever you [might] turn, there is the Face of Allah.

word: أَيۡنَ مَا
translation: Where (?)

word: وَجَعَلَنِي مُبَارَكًا أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُ
translation: And has made me blessed wherever I may be;

word: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ
translation: And it will be said to them, “Where are those you used to worship?”

word: نِعمَ + مَا
translation: (what good)

word: نِعِمَّا
translation: It’s excellent

word: إِن تُبۡدُواْ ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ فَنِعِمَّا هِيَۖ
translation: If you give charity openly, that is good.

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ نِعِمَّا يَعِظُكُم بِهِۦ
translation: Allah’s instructions to you are excellent.

word: بِئسَ + مَا
translation: (what bad)

word: بِئسَمَا
translation: It’s bad

word: قَالَ بِئۡسَمَا خَلَفۡتُمُونِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِيٓۖ
translation: “What an awful thing you did in my absence…”

word: بِئۡسَمَا ٱشۡتَرَوۡاْ بِهِۦٓ أَنفُسَهُمۡ
translation: Miserable is what they sold their souls for

word: فَـ + مَا
translation: (then)

word: فَمَا
translation: then … not

word: فَمَا وَهَنُواْ لِمَآ أَصَابَهُمۡ
translation: They did not waver for what afflicted them

word: فَمَا أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا
translation: Then we did not send you, [O Muhammad], as a guardian.

word: فَـمَا
translation: So .. what is?

word: قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكَ يَٰسَٰمِرِيُّ
translation: He said, “So what do you have to say, O Samarian?”

word: فَـمَا
translation: (then)

word: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: “So what is your opinion about the Lord of the Worlds?”

word: أَمَّا
translation: As for

word: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ
translation: And as for Aad; they were annihilated by a furious, roaring wind.

word: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُواْ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبٗا
translation: But as for the unjust—they will be firewood for Hell.”

word: إِمَّا
translation: If

word: فَإِمَّا يَأۡتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدٗى فَمَن تَبِعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
translation: And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray

word: إِمَّا
translation: Either .. or

word: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَ إِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ
translation: They said, “O Moses! Either you throw, or we are the ones to throw.”

word: رَبّ
translation: Lord/ O Lord

word: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds –

word: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمُ رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡ هَٰذَا بَلَدًا ءَامِنٗا
translation: And [mention] when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this a secure city

word: رَبَّنَا وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا مُسۡلِمَيۡنِ لَكَ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِنَآ أُمَّةٗ مُّسۡلِمَةٗ لَّكَ
translation: Our Lord, and make us Muslims [in submission] to You and from our descendants a Muslim nation [in submission] to You.

word: ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ
translation: Entirely Merciful

word: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

word: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
translation: And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

word: ٱلرَّحِيم
translation: Especially Merciful

word: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

word: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
translation: And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

word: عَزِيز
translation: (All-)Mighty

word: فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
translation: Then know that Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.

word: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَعۡنَتَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
translation: And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in difficulty. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.

word: حَكِيم
translation: (All-)Wise

word: فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
translation: Then know that Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.

word: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَعۡنَتَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
translation: And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in difficulty. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.

word: غَفُور
translation: Most forgiving

word: وَلَٰكِن يُؤَاخِذُكُم بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٞ
translation: but He holds you responsible for your intentions. And Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.

word: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٞ
translation: And know that Allah is Oft-Forgiving and Most Forbearing.

word: وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا
translation: God is Oft-Forgiving and Most Merciful.

word: حَلِيم
translation: Forbearing

word: وَلَٰكِن يُؤَاخِذُكُم بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٞ
translation: but He holds you responsible for your intentions. And Allah is Forgiving and Forbearing.

word: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٞ
translation: And know that Allah is Oft-Forgiving and Most Forbearing.

word: ٱلعَظِيم
translation: Great

word: وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
translation: and their preservation does not burden Him. He is the Most High, the most Great.

word: وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
translation: And Allah is the Possessor of Great bounty.

word: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne."

word: ٱلعَلِيّ
translation: Exalted (high)

word: وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
translation: and their preservation does not burden Him. He is the Most High, the most Great.

word: عَلِيم
translation: (All-knowing) Knower

word: فَرِيضَةٗ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
translation: [These shares are] an obligation [imposed] by Allah. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing and All-Wise.

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا خَبِيرٗا
translation: Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, Acquainted [with all things].

word: قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَٰذَاۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
translation: she said, “Who informed you of this?” He said, “The All-Knowing, the Acquainted, informed me.”

word: خَبِير
translation: Acquainted

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا خَبِيرٗا
translation: Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, Acquainted [with all things].

word: قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَٰذَاۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
translation: she said, “Who informed you of this?” He said, “The All-Knowing, the Acquainted, informed me.”

word: سَمِيع
translation: The one who hears everything (all-hearing)

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا
translation: Indeed, Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

word: فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا
translation: then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

word: بَصِير
translation: All-seeing

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا
translation: Indeed, Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

word: فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا
translation: then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

word: شَكُور
translation: Appreciative/ Grateful

word: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ
translation: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.

word: وَذَكِّرۡهُم بِأَيَّىٰمِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ
translation: And remind them of the days of Allah." Indeed, in that are signs for everyone patient and Appreciative.

word: قَدِير
translation: Competent

word: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
translation: Do you not know that Allah is over all things Competent?

word: فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوّٗا قَدِيرًا
translation: indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Competent.

word: وَكِيل
translation: Disposer (of all affairs)

word: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
translation: So leave them alone and rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.

word: وَقَالُواْ حَسۡبُنَا ٱللَّهُ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡوَكِيلُ
translation: and they said, "Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs."

word: نَصِير
translation: (Strong) helper

word: وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
translation: and that apart from Allah you have no guardian or helper?

word: وَٱجۡعَل لَّنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا وَٱجۡعَل لَّنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ نَصِيرًا
translation: And appoint for us from Yourself a protector and appoint for us from Yourself a helper?"

word: حَمِيد
translation: Praiseworthy

word: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ
translation: And know that Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.

word: رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ
translation: May the mercy of Allah and His blessings be upon you, people of the house. Indeed, He is Praiseworthy and Glorious.”

word: تَوَّاب
translation: Acceptor of repentance

word: وَتُبۡ عَلَيۡنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
translation: and accept our repentance. Indeed, You are the Acceptor of Repentance, the Especially Merciful.

word: وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٞ رَّحِيمٞ
translation: And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.

word: أَوَّل
translation: First

word: إِنَّ أَوَّلَ بَيۡتٖ وُضِعَ لِلنَّاسِ لَلَّذِي بِبَكَّةَ
translation: Indeed, the first House [of worship] established for mankind was that at Makkah -

word: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَسۡلَمَۖ
translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to be the first [among you] who submit [to Allah]

word: ءَاخِر
translation: Last

word: وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: And the last of their call will be, "Praise be/due to Allah, Lord of the worlds!"

word: تَكُونُ لَنَا عِيدٗا لِّأَوَّلِنَا وَءَاخِرِنَا وَءَايَةٗ مِّنكَۖ
translation: to be for us a feast for the first of us and the last of us and a sign from You.

word: قَرِيب
translation: Near

word: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ
translation: And when My servants ask you, [O Muhammad], concerning Me - indeed I am near.

word: أَقۡرَب
translation: Nearer

word: هُمۡ لِلۡكُفۡرِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ أَقۡرَبُ مِنۡهُمۡ لِلۡإِيمَٰنِۚ
translation: They were nearer to disbelief that day than to faith,-

word: بَعِيد
translation: Far

word: وَيُرِيدُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَن يُضِلَّهُمۡ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدٗا
translation: and Satan wishes to lead them far astray.

word: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٞ مَّا تُوعَدُون
translation: And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.

word: شَدِيد
translation: Severe / Strong

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
translation: Indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

word: أَشَدّ
translation: Severer / Stronger

word: لَتَجِدَنَّ أَشَدَّ ٱلنَّاسِ عَدَٰوَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱلۡيَهُودَ
translation: You will surely find the most intense of the people in animosity towards the believers [to be] the Jews

word: كَبِير
translation: Great / Large

word: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلشَّهۡرِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ قِتَالٖ فِيهِۖ قُلۡ قِتَالٞ فِيهِ كَبِيرٞۚ وَصَدٌّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَكُفۡرُۢ بِهِۦ وَٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ وَإِخۡرَاجُ أَهۡلِهِۦ مِنۡهُ أَكۡبَرُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: They ask you about the sacred month - about fighting therein. Say, "Fighting therein is great (sin), but averting (people) from the way of Allah and disbelief in Him and (preventing access to) al-Masjid al-Haram and the expulsion of its people therefrom are greater (evil) in the sight of Allah.

word: وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ نَفَقَةً صَغِيرَةً وَلَا كَبِيرَةً وَلَا يَقْطَعُونَ وَادِيًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمْ
translation: Nor do they spend an expenditure, small or large, or cross a valley but that it is registered for them

word: أَكۡبَر
translation: Greater / Larger

word: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلشَّهۡرِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ قِتَالٖ فِيهِۖ قُلۡ قِتَالٞ فِيهِ كَبِيرٞۚ وَصَدٌّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَكُفۡرُۢ بِهِۦ وَٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ وَإِخۡرَاجُ أَهۡلِهِۦ مِنۡهُ أَكۡبَرُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: They ask you about the sacred month - about fighting therein. Say, "Fighting therein is great (sin), but averting (people) from the way of Allah and disbelief in Him and (preventing access to) al-Masjid al-Haram and the expulsion of its people therefrom are greater (evil) in the sight of Allah.

word: كَثِير
translation: Many

word: يُضِلُّ بِهِۦ كَثِيرٗا وَيَهۡدِي بِهِۦ كَثِيرٗاۚ
translation: He misleads many thereby and guides many thereby.

word: أَكۡثَر
translation: Most

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
translation: Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people are not grateful.

word: سَرِيع
translation: Swift

word: وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
translation: And whoever disbelieves in the signs/verses of Allah, then indeed, Allah is swift in (taking) account.

word: أَسۡرَع
translation: swiftest

word: أَلَا لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَهُوَ أَسۡرَعُ ٱلۡحَٰسِبِينَ
translation: Unquestionably, His is the judgement, and He is the swiftest of accountants.

word: قَلِيل
translation: Little/ few

word: ٱعۡمَلُوٓاْ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكۡرٗاۚ وَقَلِيلٞ مِّنۡ عِبَادِيَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
translation: Work, O family of David, in gratitude. And few of My servants are grateful.

word: ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَٰذَا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ لِيَشۡتَرُواْ بِهِۦ ثَمَنٗا قَلِيلٗاۖ
translation: then (they) say, "This is from Allah," in order to exchange it for a small price.

word: كَرِيم
translation: Noble

word: لَّهُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
translation: Those are the believers, truly. For them are degrees (of high position) with their Lord and forgiveness and noble provision.

word: وَقُلۡنَ حَٰشَ لِلَّهِ مَا هَٰذَا بَشَرًا إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا مَلَكٞ كَرِيمٞ
translation: and (they) said, "Perfect is Allah! This is not a man; this is none but a noble angel."

word: حَفِيظ
translation: Guardian/ Protector

word: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ
translation: (Joseph) said, "Appoint me over the storehouses of the land. Indeed, I will be a knowledgeable guardian."

word: وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا
translation: but those who turn away - We have not sent you over them as a guardian.

word: أَحۡسَن
translation: Better

word: وَإِذَا حُيِّيتُم بِتَحِيَّةٖ فَحَيُّواْ بِأَحۡسَنَ مِنۡهَآ أَوۡ رُدُّوهَآۗ
translation: And when you are greeted with a greeting, greet (in return) with one better than it or (at least) return it (in a like manner).

word: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ حُكۡمٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ
translation: But who is better than Allah in judgement for a people who are certain (in faith).

word: أَظۡلَم
translation: More unjust

word: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
translation: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah

word: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن مَّنَعَ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ أَن يُذۡكَرَ فِيهَا ٱسۡمُهُ
translation: And who are more unjust than those who prevent the name of Allah from being mentioned in His mosques

word: أَحَق
translation: More worthy

word: قَالُوٓاْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ عَلَيۡنَا وَنَحۡنُ أَحَقُّ بِٱلۡمُلۡكِ مِنۡهُ
translation: They said, "How can he have kingship over us while we are more worthy of kingship than him

word: فَأَيُّ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ أَحَقُّ بِٱلۡأَمۡنِۖ
translation: So which of the two parties has more right to security,

word: أَدۡنَى
translation: Nearer/ More likely

word: ذَٰلِكُمۡ أَقۡسَطُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأَقۡوَمُ لِلشَّهَٰدَةِ وَأَدۡنَىٰٓ أَلَّا تَرۡتَابُوٓاْ
translation: That is more just in the sight of Allah and stronger as evidence and more likely to prevent doubt between you,

word: ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَلَّا تَعُولُواْ
translation: That is more suitable that you may not incline (to injustice).

word: رَسُول
translation: Messenger

word: مَّا ٱلۡمَسِيحُ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ إِلَّا رَسُولٞ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِ ٱلرُّسُلُ وَأُمُّهُۥ صِدِّيقَةٞۖ
translation: The Messiah, son of Mary, was not but a messenger; (other) messengers have passed on before him. And his mother was a supporter of truth.

word: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَهِدَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَلَّا نُؤۡمِنَ لِرَسُولٍ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِيَنَا بِقُرۡبَان تَأۡكُلُهُ ٱلنَّارُۗ قُلۡ قَدۡ جَآءَكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِي بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ
translation: (They are) those who said, "Indeed, Allah has taken our promise not to believe any messenger until he brings us an offering which fire (from heaven) will consume." Say, "There have already come to you messengers before me with clear proofs

word: رُسُل
translation: Messengers

word: مَّا ٱلۡمَسِيحُ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ إِلَّا رَسُولٞ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِ ٱلرُّسُلُ وَأُمُّهُۥ صِدِّيقَةٞۖ
translation: The Messiah, son of Mary, was not but a messenger; (other) messengers have passed on before him. And his mother was a supporter of truth.

word: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَهِدَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَلَّا نُؤۡمِنَ لِرَسُولٍ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِيَنَا بِقُرۡبَان تَأۡكُلُهُ ٱلنَّارُۗ قُلۡ قَدۡ جَآءَكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِي بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ
translation: (They are) those who said, "Indeed, Allah has taken our promise not to believe any messenger until he brings us an offering which fire (from heaven) will consume." Say, "There have already come to you messengers before me with clear proofs

word: نَبِي
translation: Prophet

word: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّآ أَخَذۡنَآ أَهۡلَهَا بِٱلۡبَأۡسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ
translation: And We sent to no city a prophet (who was denied) except that We seized its people with poverty and hardship

word: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٖ وَلَا نَبِيٍّ إِلَّآ إِذَا تَمَنَّىٰٓ أَلۡقَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فِيٓ أُمۡنِيَّتِهِۦ
translation: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke (or recited), Satan threw into it (some misunderstanding).

word: أَنۢبِيَآء
translation: Prophets

word: قُلۡ فَلِمَ تَقۡتُلُونَ أَنۢبِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ مِن قَبۡلُ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
translation: Say, "Then why did you kill the prophets of Allah before, if you are (indeed) believers?"

word: نَّبِيُّونَ
translation: Prophets

word: يَحۡكُمُ بِهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّونَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسۡلَمُواْ لِلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ
translation: The prophets who submitted (to Allah) judged by it for the Jews,

word: نَّبِيِّـۧنَ
translation: Prophets

word: وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ
translation: And We have made some of the prophets exceed others (in various ways),

word: أَمِين
translation: Trustworthy/ Honest

word: إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ
translation: Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger.

word: فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهُۥ قَالَ إِنَّكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَدَيۡنَا مَكِينٌ أَمِينٞ
translation: And when he spoke to him, he said, "Indeed, you are today established (in position) and trusted."

word: نَذِير
translation: Warner

word: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗاۖ
translation: Indeed, We have sent you, (O Muhammad), with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner,

word: وَقُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
translation: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -

word: مُوسَىٰ
translation: Moses

word: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ
translation: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light.

word: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِ
translation: Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment

word: هَٰرُون
translation: Aaron

word: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ
translation: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light.

word: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِ
translation: Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment

word: إِبۡرَٰهِـۧم (إِبۡرَٰهِيم)
translation: Abraham

word: وَإِذِ ٱبۡتَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِ
translation: And (mention, O Muhammad), when Abraham was tried by his Lord with commands and he fulfilled them.

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ وَنُوحٗا وَءَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَءَالَ عِمۡرَٰنَ
translation: Indeed, Allah chose Adam and Noah and the family of Abraham and the family of 'Imran

word: قُلۡ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ
translation: Say, "We have believed in Allah and in what was revealed to us and what was revealed to Abraham, Ishmael,

word: إِسۡمَٰعِيل
translation: Ishmael

word: قُلۡ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ
translation: Say, "We have believed in Allah and in what was revealed to us and what was revealed to Abraham, Ishmael,

word: نُوح
translation: Noah

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ وَنُوحٗا وَءَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ
translation: Indeed, Allah chose Adam and Noah and the family of Abraham and the family of 'Imran

word: قِيلَ يَٰنُوحُ ٱهۡبِطۡ بِسَلَٰمٖ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَٰتٍ عَلَيۡكَ
translation: It was said, "O Noah, disembark in security from Us and blessings upon you

word: يُوسُف
translation: Joseph

word: إِذۡ قَالَ يُوسُفُ لِأَبِيهِ يَٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّي رَأَيۡتُ أَحَدَ عَشَرَ كَوۡكَبٗا
translation: (Of these stories mention) when Joseph said to his father, "O my father, indeed I have seen (in a dream) eleven stars

word: لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ
translation: Certainly were there in Joseph and his brothers signs for those who ask,

word: لُوط
translation: Lot

word: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
translation: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,

word: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
translation: And (mention) Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality while you are seeing?

word: عِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَم
translation: Jesus, son of Mary

word: وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ إِنَّا قَتَلۡنَا ٱلۡمَسِيحَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ وَمَا صَلَبُوهُ
translation: And (for) their saying, "Indeed, we have killed the Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary, the messenger of Allah." And they did not kill him, and they did not crucify him

word: قُلۡ فَمَن يَمۡلِكُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔا إِنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡمَسِيحَ ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ
translation: Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He had intended to destroy Messiah, the son of Mary,

word: ءَادَم
translation: Adam

word: وَعَلَّمَ ءَادَمَ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ
translation: And He taught Adam the names - all of them. Then He showed them to the angels

word: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ
translation: Then Adam received from his Lord (some) words, and He accepted his repentance.

word: سُلَيۡمَٰن
translation: Solomon

word: وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ كَفَرُواْ
translation: It was not Solomon who disbelieved, but the devils disbelieved,

word: وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِۦ دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُوسُفَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَۚ
translation: and among his descendants, David and Solomon and Job and Joseph and Moses and Aaron.

word: إِسۡحَٰق
translation: Isaac

word: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
translation: And his wife was standing, and she smiled. Then We gave her good tidings of Isaac and after Isaac, Jacob.

word: يَعۡقُوب
translation: Jacob

word: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
translation: And his wife was standing, and she smiled. Then We gave her good tidings of Isaac and after Isaac, Jacob.

word: إِسۡرَٰٓءِيل
translation: Israel

word: وَءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
translation: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel

word: دَاوُۥد
translation: David

word: وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا
translation: And We have made some of the prophets exceed others (in various ways), and to David We gave the book (of Psalms).

word: فَهَزَمُوهُم بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ
translation: So they defeated them by permission of Allah, and David killed Goliath,

word: زَكَرِيا
translation: Zachariah

word: ذِكۡرُ رَحۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَبۡدَهُۥ زَكَرِيَّآ
translation: (This is) a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah

word: يَحۡيَىٰ
translation: John

word: يَٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ ٱسۡمُهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ
translation: O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John.

word: أَيُّوب
translation: Job

word: وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
translation: And (mention) Job, when he called to his Lord, Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."

word: يُونُس (ذَا ٱلنُّون)
translation: Jonah

word: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
translation: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers. (37:139)

word: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَٰضِبٗا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ
translation: And (mention) the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree (anything) upon him.

word: شُعَيۡب (مَدۡيَن)
translation: Shu’ayb (Madian)

word: وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡيَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ
translation: And to (the people of) Madyan (We sent) their brother Shu'ayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah;

word: صَٰلِح (ثَمُود)
translation: Salih (Thamud)

word: وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ
translation: And to Thamud (We sent) their brother Salih. He said, "O my people, worship Allah;

word: هُود (عَاد)
translation: Hud (‘Aad)

word: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ
translation: And to 'Aad (We sent) their brother 11. He said, "O my people, worship Allah;

word: ءَاية
translation: Sign/ verse

word: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
translation: Even if every sign should come to them, until they see the painful punishment.

word: ءَايات
translation: Signs/ verses

word: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ
translation: And We have certainly revealed to you verses (which are) clear proofs,

word: ٱلۡقُرۡءَان
translation: The Quran

word: وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَقّٗا فِي ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلِ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ
translation: (It is) a true promise (binding) upon Him in the Torah and the Gospel and the Qur'an.

word: شَهۡرُ رَمَضَانَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ فِيهِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ هُدٗى لِّلنَّاسِ
translation: The month of Ramadhan (is that) in which was revealed the Qur'an, a guidance for the people

word: ٱلۡإِنجِيل
translation: The Gospel

word: وَلۡيَحۡكُمۡ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلِ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِۚ
translation: And let the People of the Gospel judge by what Allah has revealed therein.

word: وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَقّٗا فِي ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلِ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ
translation: (It is) a true promise (binding) upon Him in the Torah and the Gospel and the Qur'an.

word: ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰة
translation: The Torah

word: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ أَقَامُواْ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِم
translation: And if only they upheld (the law of) the Torah, the Gospel, and what has been revealed to them

word: وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَقّٗا فِي ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلِ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ
translation: (It is) a true promise (binding) upon Him in the Torah and the Gospel and the Qur'an.

word: أَنۡعَام
translation: Livestock

word: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِع
translation: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and (numerous) benefits,

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ كَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّۚ
translation: They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are (even) more astray in (their) way.

word: جَبَل
translation: Mountain

word: وَإِذۡ نَتَقۡنَا ٱلۡجَبَلَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٞ
translation: And (mention) when We raised the mountain above them as if it was a dark cloud

word: جِبَال
translation: Mountains

word: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا
translation: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.

word: بَـحۡر
translation: Sea/ River

word: وَٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِأَمۡرِهِ
translation: and the ships which run through the sea by His command

word: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي مَرَجَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ هَٰذَا عَذۡبٞ فُرَاتٞ وَهَٰذَا مِلۡحٌ أُجَاجٞ
translation: And it is He who has released (simultaneously) the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter,

word: نَهَر
translation: River

word: كِلۡتَا ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ ءَاتَتۡ أُكُلَهَا وَلَمۡ تَظۡلِم مِّنۡهُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَفَجَّرۡنَا خِلَٰلَهُمَا نَهَرٗا
translation: Each of the two gardens produced its fruit and did not fall short thereof in anything. And We caused to gush forth within them a river.

word: أَنۡهَٰر
translation: Rivers

word: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَنَهَرٖ
translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among in gardens and rivers,

word: شَمۡس
translation: Sun

word: أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِدُلُوكِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ ٱلَّيۡلِ
translation: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun (from its meridian) until the darkness of the night

word: قَمَر
translation: Moon

word: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ
translation: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon;

word: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ
translation: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns (appearing) like the old date stalk.

word: لَيۡل
translation: Night

word: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ
translation: And a sign for them is the night. We extract from it (the light of) day, so they are (left) in darkness.

word: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ
translation: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day,

word: نَهَار
translation: Daytime

word: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ
translation: And a sign for them is the night. We extract from it (the light of) day, so they are (left) in darkness.

word: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ
translation: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day,

word: أَرۡض
translation: Earth

word: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا
translation: The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them,

word: يَٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰكَ خَلِيفَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
translation: “O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth,

word: سَمَآء
translation: Heaven/ Sky

word: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا بَٰطِلٗاۚ
translation: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly.

word: سَمَٰوَٰت
translation: Heavens

word: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ
translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Most Forgiving."

word: ءَالَآء
translation: Favors

word: فَٱذۡكُرُوٓاْ ءَالَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
translation: So remember the favors of Allah that you might succeed.

word: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
translation: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

word: نِعۡمَة
translation: Favor/ Bounty

word: وَمَن يُبَدِّلۡ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
translation: And whoever exchanges the favor of Allah (for disbelief) after it has come to him - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

word: وَٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَمِيثَٰقَهُ ٱلَّذِي وَاثَقَكُم بِه
translation: And remember the favor of Allah upon you and His covenant with which He bound you

word: فَضۡل
translation: Favor/ Grace

word: فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
translation: And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, you would have been among the losers.

word: وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
translation: and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

word: مَآء
translation: Water

word: فَأَنزَلۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡمَآءَ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦ مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۚ
translation: and We send down rain therein and bring forth thereby (some) of all the fruits.

word: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ حَيٍّۚ أَفَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
translation: and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?

word: دِين
translation: Religion

word: إِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمُۗ
translation: Indeed, the religion in the sight of Allah is Islam.

word: هُوَ ٱجۡتَبَىٰكُمۡ وَمَا جَعَلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِ مِنۡ حَرَجٖۚ
translation: He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty.

word: أَمۡر
translation: Matter/ Command

word: وَإِذَا كَانُواْ مَعَهُۥ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ جَامِعٖ لَّمۡ يَذۡهَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُوهُ ۚ
translation: when they are (meeting) with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission.

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ
translation: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness (for) me."

word: وَلَا تُطِيعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
translation: And do not obey the order of the transgressors,

word: أُمُور
translation: Matters/ Affairs

word: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
translation: and be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, (all) that is of the matters (requiring) determination.

word: وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
translation: And to Allah will be the outcome of (all) matters.

word: صَلَوٰة /صَلَاة
translation: Prayer

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
translation: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them,

word: قُلۡ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحۡيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: Say, "Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds.

word: زَّكَوٰة
translation: (Zakah) Charity

word: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرۡكَعُواْ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
translation: And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow (in worship and obedience).

word: فَسَأَكۡتُبُهَا لِلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
translation: o I will decree it (especially) for those who fear Me and give zakah and those who believe in Our verses -

word: حَقّ
translation: Truth/ Right

word: وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
translation: And among the people of Moses is a community which guides by truth and by it establishes justice.

word: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
translation: And among those We created is a community which guides by truth and thereby establishes justice.

word: بَٰطِل
translation: Falsehood

word: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
translation: That He should establish the truth and abolish falsehood, even if the criminals disliked it.

word: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا
translation: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, (by nature), ever bound to depart."

word: حَمۡد
translation: Praise

word: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: (All) praise is (due) to Allah, Lord of the worlds -

word: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
translation: So exalt (Allah) with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate (to Him).

word: حِكۡمَة
translation: Wisdom

word: وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ وَءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَعَلَّمَهُۥ مِمَّا يَشَآءُۗ
translation: and David killed Goliath, and Allah gave him the kingship and prophethood and taught him from that which He willed.

word: يُؤۡتِي ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُؤۡتَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ فَقَدۡ أُوتِيَ خَيۡرٗا كَثِيرٗاۗ
translation: He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good.

word: تَقۡوى
translation: Piety/ Fear of Allah

word: وَتَعَاوَنُواْ عَلَى ٱلۡبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۖ وَلَا تَعَاوَنُواْ عَلَى ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِۚ
translation: And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression.

word: وَتَزَوَّدُواْ فَإِنَّ خَيۡرَ ٱلزَّادِ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۖ
translation: And take provisions, but indeed, the best provision is fear of Allah.

word: شَهِيد
translation: Witness

word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَسَطٗا لِّتَكُونُواْ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۗ
translation: And thus we have made you a just community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you.

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدًا
translation: Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, a Witness.

word: شُهَدَاء
translation: Witnesses

word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَسَطٗا لِّتَكُونُواْ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۗ
translation: And thus we have made you a just community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you.

word: شُهَدَاء
translation: Martyrs

word: وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَتَّخِذَ مِنكُمۡ شُهَدَآءَۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
translation: so that Allah may make evident those who believe and (may) take to Himself from among you martyrs - and Allah does not like the wrongdoers

word: مُبِين
translation: Clear

word: وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
translation: and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.

word: إِنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كَانُواْ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٗا مُّبِينٗا
translation: Indeed, the disbelievers are ever to you a clear enemy.

word: نُور
