translation: Light

word: قَدۡ جَآءَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ نُورٞ وَكِتَٰبٞ مُّبِينٞ
translation: There has come to you from Allah a light and a clear Book.

word: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَا ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ فِيهَا هُدٗى وَنُورٞۚ
translation: Indeed, We sent down the Torah, in which was guidance and light.

word: سَلَٰم
translation: Peace

word: وَإِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ
translation: And when those come to you who believe in Our verses, say, "Peace be upon you.

word: يَهۡدِي بِهِ ٱللَّهُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ سُبُلَ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ
translation: By which Allah guides those who pursue His pleasure to the ways of peace

word: مُلۡك
translation: Dominion/ Reign

word: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۚ
translation: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them.

word: وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ وَءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ
translation: And David killed Goliath, and Allah gave him the kingship and prophethood

word: سُلۡطَٰن
translation: Warrant/ Proof

word: وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ جَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗا مُّبِينٗا
translation: And those - We have made for you against them a clear authorization.

word: سُلۡطَٰن
translation: Authority

word: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِهِۦ سُلۡطَٰنٗا
translation: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority

word: إِلَٰه
translation: god/ deity

word: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ
translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.

word: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ إِلَٰهَكَ وَ إِلَٰهَ ءَابَآئِكَ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗا
translation: They said, "We will worship your God and the God of your fathers, Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac - one God.

word: إءَالِهَة
translation: deities

word: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَشۡهَدُونَ أَنَّ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً أُخۡرَىٰۚ قُل لَّآ أَشۡهَدُۚ
translation: Do you (truly) testify that there are other deities with Allah?" Say, "I will not testify (with you).

word: وَاحِد
translation: One

word: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ إِلَٰهَكَ وَإِلَٰهَ ءَابَآئِكَ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗا
translation: They said, "We will worship your God and the God of your fathers, Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac - one God.

word: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗا
translation: And they were not commanded except to worship one God;

word: أَحَد
translation: One

word: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
translation: Say, "He is Allah, (who is) One,

word: أَحَد
translation: Anyone

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ
translation: (Allah praises) those who convey the messages of Allah and fear Him and do not fear anyone but Allah.

word: شَرِيك
translation: Associate/ partner

word: قُلۡ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحۡيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ ١٦٢لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
translation: Say, "Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah, Lord of the worlds. (162) No partner has He.

word: شُرَكَآء
translation: Associate(s)/ partner(s)

word: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَٰلِحٗا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَاۚ
translation: But when He gives them a good (child), they ascribe partners to Him concerning that which He has given them.

word: وَجَعَلُواْ لِلَّهِ شُرَكَآءَ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَخَلَقَهُمۡۖ
translation: But they have attributed to Allah partners - the jinn, while He has created them

word: غَيۡب
translation: Unseen

word: وَلَوۡ كُنتُ أَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ لَٱسۡتَكۡثَرۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِيَ ٱلسُّوٓءُۚ
translation: And if I knew the unseen, I could have acquired much wealth, and no harm would have touched me.

word: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ
translation: He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the unseen (aspects) of the heavens and the earth?

word: شَهَٰدَة
translation: Witnessed (visible)

word: ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
translation: Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do."

word: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ ٱلۡمُتَعَالِ
translation: (He is) Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted.

word: عَرَش
translation: Throne

word: ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ
translation: The Most Merciful (who is) above the Throne established.

word: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
translation: there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne."

word: كِتَاب
translation: Book

word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah -

word: وَٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن كِتَابِ رَبِّكَۖ
translation: And recite, (O Muhammad), what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord.

word: كُتُب
translation: Books

word: كُلٌّ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيۡنَ أَحَدٖ مِّن رُّسُلِهِۦ
translation: All of them have believed in Allah and His angels and His books and His messengers

word: كَلِمَة
translation: Word

word: يَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ مَا قَالُواْ وَلَقَدۡ قَالُواْ كَلِمَةَ ٱلۡكُفۡرِ وَكَفَرُواْ
translation: They swear by Allah that they did not say (anything against the Prophet) while they had said the word of disbelief and disbelieved

word: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُبَشِّرُكِ بِكَلِمَةٖ مِّنۡهُ ٱسۡمُهُ ٱلۡمَسِيحُ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ
translation: O Mary, indeed Allah gives you good tidings of a word from Him, whose name will be the Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary -

word: كَلِمَٰت
translation: Words

word: لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
translation: No change is there in the words of Allah. That is what is the great attainment.

word: مَلَك
translation: Angel

word: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞۖ
translation: And they say, Why was there not sent down to him an angel?"

word: مَلَٰٓئِكَة
translation: Angels

word: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ
translation: And (mention) when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees.

word: عَهۡد
translation: Covenant/ Pledge

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مِيثَٰقِهِۦ
translation: Who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined

word: وَأَوۡفُواْ بِعَهۡدِيٓ أُوفِ بِعَهۡدِكُمۡ وَإِيَّٰيَ فَٱرۡهَبُونِ
translation: and fulfill My covenant (upon you) that I will fulfill your covenant (from Me), and be afraid of (only) Me.

word: مِيثَٰق
translation: Covenant

word: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ لَا تَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ
translation: And (recall) when We took the covenant from the Children of Israel, (enjoining upon them), "Do not worship except Allah;

word: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ لَا تَسۡفِكُونَ دِمَآءَكُمۡ وَلَا تُخۡرِجُونَ أَنفُسَكُم
translation: And (recall) when We took your covenant, (saying), "Do not shed each other's blood or evict one another

word: إِذۡن
translation: Permission

word: وَمَا هُم بِضَآرِّينَ بِهِۦ مِنۡ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: But they do not harm anyone through it except by permission of Allah.

word: فَهَزَمُوهُم بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ
translation: So they defeated them by permission of Allah, and David killed Goliath,

word: شَيۡطَٰن
translation: Satan (Devil)

word: ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱلۡفَقۡرَ وَيَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِۖ
translation: Satan threatens you with poverty and orders you to immorality,

word: شَيَٰطِين
translation: Satan (Devils)

word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا شَيَٰطِينَ ٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلۡجِنِّ
translation: And thus We have made for every prophet an enemy - devils from mankind and jinn,

word: عَمَل
translation: Deed/ action

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُصۡلِحُ عَمَلَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
translation: Indeed, Allah does not amend the work of corrupters.

word: أَعۡمَٰل
translation: Deeds/ actions

word: وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلٞ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَٰمِلُونَ
translation: and they have (evil) deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,

word: حَسَنَة
translation: Good/ Good deed(s)

word: مَّآ أَصَابَكَ مِنۡ حَسَنَةٖ فَمِنَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَمَآ أَصَابَكَ مِن سَيِّئَةٖ فَمِن نَّفۡسِكَۚ
translation: What comes to you of good is from Allah, but what comes to you of evil, (O man), is from yourself.

word: حَسَنَٰت
translation: Good/ Good deed(s)

word: إِنَّ ٱلۡحَسَنَٰتِ يُذۡهِبۡنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ
translation: Indeed, good deeds do away with misdeeds.

word: سَيِّئَة
translation: Bad/ misdeed/ sin

word: وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِكَۚ
translation: and if evil befalls them, they say, "This is from you."

word: سَيِّئَات
translation: Bad/ misdees/ sins

word: وَلَيۡسَتِ ٱلتَّوۡبَةُ لِلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ
translation: But repentance is not (accepted) of those who (continue to) do evil deeds up until, when death comes to one of them,

word: خَيۡر
translation: Good

word: رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ إِلَيَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَقِيرٞ
translation: My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.

word: إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
translation: Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy."

word: شَرّ
translation: Evil/ Worst

word: هَٰذَاۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٖ
translation: This (is so). But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -

word: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
translation: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are the deaf and dumb who do not use reason.

word: إِثۡم
translation: Sin

word: فَمَن تَعَجَّلَ فِي يَوۡمَيۡنِ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِ وَمَن تَأَخَّرَ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِۖ
translation: Then whoever hastens (his departure) in two days - there is no sin upon him; and whoever delays (until the third) - there is no sin upon him -

word: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِۚ
translation: And when it is said to him, "Fear Allah," pride in the sin takes hold of him.

word: ذَنۢب
translation: Sin

word: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ
translation: The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance.

word: ذُنُوب
translation: Sins

word: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: Those who say, "Our Lord, indeed we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire,"

word: جُنَاح
translation: Blame

word: لَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَبۡتَغُواْ فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡۚ
translation: There is no blame upon you for seeking bounty from your Lord (during Hajj).

word: وَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَيۡتَ مِمَّنۡ عَزَلۡتَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكَۚ
translation: And any that you desire of those (wives) from whom you had (temporarily) separated - there is no blame upon you (in returning her).

word: حَرَام
translation: Unlawful (forbidden)

word: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَا تَصِفُ أَلۡسِنَتُكُمُ ٱلۡكَذِبَ هَٰذَا حَلَٰلٞ وَهَٰذَا حَرَامٞ لِّتَفۡتَرُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۚ
translation: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah.

word: حَلَٰل
translation: Permissible (halal)

word: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَا تَصِفُ أَلۡسِنَتُكُمُ ٱلۡكَذِبَ هَٰذَا حَلَٰلٞ وَهَٰذَا حَرَامٞ لِّتَفۡتَرُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۚ
translation: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah.

word: كُلُواْ مِمَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ
translation: eat from whatever is on earth (that is) lawful and good and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.

word: حَدِيث
translation: Conversation/ Discourse

word: فَلَا تَقۡعُدُواْ مَعَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُواْ فِي حَدِيثٍ غَيۡرِهِۦ
translation: so do not sit with them until they enter into another conversation.

word: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ إِن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
translation: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, (O Muhammad), if they do not believe in this message, (and) out of sorrow.

word: طَيِّب
translation: Good thing

word: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا كَلِمَةٗ طَيِّبَةٗ كَشَجَرَةٖ طَيِّبَةٍ
translation: Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, (making) a good word like a good tree,

word: كُلُواْ مِمَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ
translation: eat from whatever is on earth (that is) lawful and good and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.

word: طَيِّبَٰت
translation: Good things

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ كُلُواْ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا رَزَقۡنَٰكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِلَّهِ
translation: O you who have believed, eat from the good things which We have provided for you and be grateful to Allah

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنفِقُواْ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا كَسَبۡتُمۡ
translation: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned

word: أَجۡر
translation: Reward/ Compensation

word: لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٌ
translation: For those who did good among them and feared Allah is a great reward -

word: أُجُور
translation: Rewards/ Compensations

word: وَإِنَّمَا تُوَفَّوۡنَ أُجُورَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۖ
translation: and you will only be given your (full) compensation on the Day of Resurrection.

word: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ
translation: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty.

word: يَوۡم
translation: Day

word: مَٰلِكِ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.

word: قَالُواْ لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِۦۚ
translation: they said, "There is no power for us today against Goliath and his soldiers."

word: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
translation: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah and the Last Day," but they are not believers.

word: أَيَّام
translation: Days

word: وَقَالُواْ لَن تَمَسَّنَا ٱلنَّارُ إِلَّآ أَيَّامٗا مَّعۡدُودَةٗۚ
translation: And they say, "Never will the Fire touch us, except for a few days."

word: يَوۡمَئِذٍ
translation: That day, then

word: وَٱلۡوَزۡنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ
translation: And the weighing (of deeds) that Day will be the truth.

word: وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ
translation: And We will leave them that day surging over each other,

word: ٱلۡقِيَٰمَة
translation: Resurrection

word: فَٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
translation: But Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

word: لَيَجۡمَعَنَّكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۗ
translation: He will surely assemble you for (account on) the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt.

word: ٱلسَّاعَة
translation: An hour (The Hour)

word: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ قَالُواْ يَٰحَسۡرَتَنَا
translation: until when the Hour (of resurrection) comes upon them unexpectedly, they will say, "Oh, (how great is) our regret

word: فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
translation: So when their time has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede (it).

word: لَّقَد تَّابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ وَٱلۡأَنصَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ فِي سَاعَةِ ٱلۡعُسۡرَةِ
translation: Allah has already forgiven the Prophet and the Muhajireen and the Ansar who followed him in the hour of difficulty

word: أَجَل
translation: Term

word: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ
translation: And for every nation is a (specified) term. So when their time has come, they will not remain behind an hour,

word: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ
translation: But when We removed the punishment from them until a term which they were to reach, then at once they broke their word.

word: مُسَمَّى
translation: Specific

word: ثُمَّ قَضَىٰٓ أَجَلٗاۖ وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمًّى عِندَهُۥ
translation: and then decreed a term and a specified time (known) to Him;

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيۡنٍ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى فَٱكۡتُبُوهُ
translation: O you who have believed, when you contract a debt for a specified term, write it down.

word: حِسَاب
translation: Account

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
translation: Those will have a share of what they have earned, and Allah is swift in account.

word: وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
translation: And whoever disbelieves in the verses of Allah, then indeed, Allah is swift in (taking) account.

word: ٱلۡأٓخِرَة
translation: The Hereafter

word: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ وَبِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ
translation: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, (O Muhammad), and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain (in faith).

word: وَلَقَدِ ٱصۡطَفَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
translation: And We had chosen him in this world, and indeed he, in the Hereafter, will be among the righteous.

word: أَبَدًا
translation: Forever, ever

word: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَن نَّدۡخُلَهَآ أَبَدٗا مَّا دَامُواْ فِيهَا
translation: They said, "O Moses, indeed we will not enter it, ever, as long as they are within it;

word: وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي تَحۡتَهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ
translation: and He has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever.

word: عَٰقِبَة
translation: End

word: فَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: so proceed throughout the earth and observe how was the end of those who denied.

word: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
translation: Say, "Travel through the land; then observe how was the end of the deniers."

word: جَهَنَّم
translation: Hell Fire, hell

word: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
translation: (It is but) a small enjoyment; then their (final) refuge is Hell, and wretched is the resting place.

word: نَار
translation: Fire

word: وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ نَارًا خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَا
translation: And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger and transgresses His limits - He will put him into the Fire to abide eternally therein,

word: وَيۡل
translation: Woe to

word: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن مَّشۡهَدِ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ
translation: so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day.

word: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُبُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَٰذَا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّه
translation: So woe to those who write the "scripture" with their own hands, then say, "This is from Allah,"

word: عِقَاب
translation: Penalty

word: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
translation: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.

word: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
translation: Know that Allah is severe in penalty and that Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

word: عَذَاب
translation: Punishment

word: لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا خِزۡيٞ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
translation: For them in this world is disgrace, and they will have in the Hereafter a great punishment.

word: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
translation: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."

word: أَلِيم
translation: Painful

word: لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ
translation: will have a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment for what they used to deny.

word: فَمَنِ ٱعۡتَدَىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُۥ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
translation: But whoever transgresses after that will have a painful punishment.

word: جَزَاء
translation: Reward/ Recompense

word: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَسَبُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ جَزَآءُ سَيِّئَةِۭ بِمِثۡلِهَا وَتَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ
translation: But they who have earned (blame for) evil doings - the recompense of an evil deed is its equivalent, and humiliation will cover them.

word: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ
translation: But as for one who believes and does righteousness, he will have a reward of Paradise,

word: ثَواب
translation: Reward

word: وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا
translation: and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse.

word: وَمَن يُرِدۡ ثَوَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ نُؤۡتِهِۦ مِنۡهَاۚ
translation: and whoever desires the reward of the Hereafter - We will give him thereof.

word: جَنَّة
translation: Paradise/ garden

word: فَمَن زُحۡزِحَ عَنِ ٱلنَّارِ وَأُدۡخِلَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ فَقَدۡ فَازَۗ
translation: So he who is drawn away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise has attained (his desire).

word: جَنَّٰت
translation: Paradise/ gardens

word: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ
translation: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens (in Paradise) beneath which rivers flow.

word: ٱلدُّنۡيَا
translation: This world (present life)

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ
translation: Those are the ones who have bought the life of this world (in exchange) for the Hereafter,

word: وَلَقَدِ ٱصۡطَفَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
translation: And We had chosen him in this world, and indeed he, in the Hereafter, will be among the righteous.

word: عَٰلَمِين
translation: Worlds

word: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: (All) praise is (due) to Allah, Lord of the worlds

word: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسۡلِمۡۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: When his Lord said to him, "Submit", he said "I have submitted (in Islam) to the Lord of the worlds."

word: أَمۡوَٰل
translation: Wealth

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ
translation: Indeed, those who disbelieve - never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all.

word: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡخَوۡفِ وَٱلۡجُوعِ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۗ
translation: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits,

word: بَيۡت
translation: House

word: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتـِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ
translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women.

word: قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ
translation: she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh

word: ٱلۡبَيۡت
translation: The Ka’ba

word: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ ١ إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ ٢ فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٣
translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh - (1) Their accustomed security (in) the caravan of winter and summer - (2) Let them worship the Lord of this House, (3)

word: وَإِذۡ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡبَيۡتَ مَثَابَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَأَمۡنٗا وَٱتَّخِذُواْ مِن مَّقَامِ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ مُصَلّٗىۖ
translation: And (mention) when We made the House a place of return for the people and (a place of) security.

word: دَار
translation: Home

word: لَهُمۡ دَارُ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
translation: For them will be the Home of Peace with their Lord. And He will be their protecting friend protector because of what they used to do.

word: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
translation: So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home (corpses) fallen prone.

word: دِيَٰر
translation: Homes

word: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ وَهُمۡ أُلُوفٌ
translation: Have you not considered those who left their homes in many thousands,

word: مَتَٰع
translation: Provision/ enjoyment

word: فَمَا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
translation: But what is the enjoyment of worldly life compared to the Hereafter except a (very) little.

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَا بَغۡيُكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمۖ مَّتَٰعَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ
translation: O mankind, your injustice is only against yourselves, (being merely) the enjoyment of worldly life.

word: مَكَان
translation: Place/ position

word: فَحَمَلَتۡهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتۡ بِهِۦ مَكَانٗا قَصِيّٗا
translation: So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place.

word: مَكَان
translation: in place of

word: وَإِذَا بَدَّلۡنَآ ءَايَةٗ مَّكَانَ ءَايَةٖ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُنَزِّلُ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُفۡتَرِۭۚ
translation: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, (O Muhammad), are but an inventor (of lies)."

word: قَرۡيَة
translation: City/ Town

word: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا ٱدۡخُلُواْ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةَ فَكُلُواْ مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ شِئۡتُمۡ رَغَدٗا
translation: And (recall) when We said, "Enter this city and eat from it wherever you will in (ease and) abundance,

word: أَوۡ كَٱلَّذِي مَرَّ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٖ وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا
translation: Or (consider such an example) as the one who passed by a township which had fallen into ruin.

word: قُرَىٰ
translation: Cities/ Towns

word: وَهَٰذَا كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مُبَارَكٞ مُّصَدِّقُ ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَلِتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَاۚ
translation: And this is a Book which We have sent down, blessed and confirming what was before it, that you may warn the Mother of Cities and those around it.

word: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمۡ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا غَٰفِلُونَ
translation: That is because your Lord would not destroy the cities for wrongdoing while their people were unaware.

word: مَدِينَة
translation: City

word: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَمَكۡرٞ مَّكَرۡتُمُوهُ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لِتُخۡرِجُواْ مِنۡهَآ أَهۡلَهَاۖ
translation: Indeed, this is a conspiracy which you conspired in the city to expel therefrom its people.

word: وَقَالَ نِسۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ تُرَٰوِدُ فَتَىٰهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ
translation: And women in the city said, "The wife of al-'Azeez is seeking to seduce her slave boy;

word: ٱلۡمَدِينَة
translation: Madinah/ the city

word: وَمِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ مَرَدُواْ عَلَى ٱلنِّفَاقِ لَا تَعۡلَمُهُمۡۖ
translation: and (also) from the people of Madinah. They have become accustomed to hypocrisy. You, (O Muhammad), do not know them,

word: يَقُولُونَ لَئِن رَّجَعۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَيُخۡرِجَنَّ ٱلۡأَعَزُّ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡأَذَلَّۚ
translation: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored (for power) will surely expel therefrom the more humble."

word: سَبِيل
translation: Way

word: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted (people) from the way of Allah.

word: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
translation: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the (rightly) guided.

word: سُبُل
translation: Ways

word: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا ١٩ لِّتَسۡلُكُواْ مِنۡهَا سُبُلٗا فِجَاجٗا
translation: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse (19) That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

word: صِرَٰط
translation: Path

word: ٱهۡدِنَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ
translation: Guide us to the straight path -

word: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
translation: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.

word: مَسۡجِد
translation: Mosque

word: فَوَلِّ وَجۡهَكَ شَطۡرَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِۚ
translation: turn your face toward al-Masjid al-Haram (sacred mosque).

word: مَسَٰجِد
translation: Mosques

word: مَا كَانَ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ أَن يَعۡمُرُواْ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَٰهِدِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلۡكُفۡرِۚ
translation: It is not for the polytheists to maintain the mosques of Allah (while) witnessing against themselves with disbelief.

word: فِتۡنَة
translation: Trial

word: وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنۡ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَآ إِنَّمَا نَحۡنُ فِتۡنَةٞ فَلَا تَكۡفُرۡۖ
translation: But the two angels do not teach anyone unless they say, "We are a trial, so do not disbelieve (by practicing magic)."

word: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا عِدَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيَسۡتَيۡقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ
translation: And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced

word: لِقَآء
translation: Meeting

word: قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِۖ
translation: Those will have lost who deny the meeting with Allah,

word: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰهُمۡ كَمَا نَسُواْ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَمَا كَانُواْ بِ
translation: So today We will forget them just as they forgot the meeting of this Day of theirs and for having rejected Our verses.

word: ذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَى
translation: Relatives

word: وَٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُشۡرِكُواْ بِهِۦ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَبِٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَٰنٗا وَبِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ
translation: Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good, and to relatives, orphans,

word: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِـذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ
translation: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for (his) near relatives

word: ٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡن
translation: Parents

word: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ لَا تَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ وَبِٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَانٗا
translation: And (recall) when We took the covenant from the Children of Israel, (enjoining upon them), "Do not worship except Allah; and to parents do good

word: وَٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُشۡرِكُواْ بِهِۦ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَبِٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَٰنٗا وَبِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ
translation: Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good, and to relatives, orphans,

word: أُمّ
translation: Mother

word: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَرۡضِعِيهِۖ
translation: And We inspired to the mother of Moses, "Suckle him;

word: وَأَصۡبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَٰرِغًاۖ
translation: And the heart of Moses' mother became empty (of all else).

word: أَبّ/أَبَتِ
translation: Father/ O father

word: قَالَتۡ إِنَّ أَبِـي يَدۡعُوكَ لِيَجۡزِيَكَ أَجۡرَ مَا سَقَيۡتَ لَنَاۚ
translation: She said, "Indeed, my father invites you that he may reward you for having watered for us."

word: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
translation: One of the women said, "O my father, hire him. Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy."

word: ءَابَآء
translation: Forefathers/ Ancestors

word: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ قَالُواْ بَلۡ نَتَّبِعُ مَآ أَلۡفَيۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ
translation: And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that which we found our fathers doing/ upon."

word: قَالُواْ بَلۡ نَتَّبِعُ مَا وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ
translation: they say, "Rather, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers."

word: زَوۡج
translation: (Spouse) Husband/ Wife

word: وَقُلۡنَا يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسۡكُنۡ أَنتَ وَزَوۡجُكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
translation: And We said, "O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise

word: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٖ وَجَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا لِيَسۡكُنَ إِلَيۡهَاۖ
translation: It is He who created you from one soul and created from it its mate that he might dwell in security with her.

word: رَجُل
translation: Man

word: أَكَانَ لِلنَّاسِ عَجَبًا أَنۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ
translation: Have the people been amazed that We revealed (revelation) to a man from among them,

word: وَلَوۡ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَلَكٗا لَّجَعَلۡنَٰهُ رَجُلٗا
translation: And if We had made him an angel, We would have made him (appear as) a man,

word: ٱمۡرَأة
translation: Woman

word: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ
translation: Indeed, I found (there) a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things,

word: ٱمۡرَأة / ٱمۡرَأت
translation: Wife

word: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ
translation: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot.

word: ذُرِّيَّة
translation: Offspring

word: هُنَالِكَ دَعَا زَكَرِيَّا رَبَّهُۥۖ قَالَ رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةٗ طَيِّبَةًۖ
translation: At that, Zechariah called upon his Lord, saying, "My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring.

word: وَلۡيَخۡشَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَوۡ تَرَكُواْ مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّةٗ ضِعَٰفًا خَافُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
translation: And let those (executors and guardians) fear (injustice) as if they (themselves) had left weak offspring behind and feared for them.

word: وَلَد
translation: Son (child)

word: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ بَل لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
translation: They say, "Allah has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth.

word: أَوۡلَٰد
translation: Sons (children)

word: قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَتَلُوٓاْ أَوۡلَٰدَهُمۡ سَفَهَۢا بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ
translation: Those will have lost who killed their children in foolishness without knowledge

word: ٱبۡن
translation: Son

word: وَءَاتَيۡنَا عِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَيَّدۡنَٰهُ بِرُوحِ ٱلۡقُدُسِۗ
translation: And We gave Jesus, the son of Mary, clear proofs and supported him with the Pure Spirit.

word: أَبۡنَآء
translation: sons

word: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَعۡرِفُونَهُۥ كَمَا يَعۡرِفُونَ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡۖ
translation: Those to whom We gave the Scripture know him as they know their own sons.

word: إِخۡوَٰن
translation: Brothers

word: قُلۡ إِصۡلَاحٞ لَّهُمۡ خَيۡرٞۖ وَإِن تُخَالِطُوهُمۡ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡۚ
translation: Say, "Improvement for them is best. And if you mix your affairs with theirs - they are your brothers.

word: وَمِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡ وَإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡۖ وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
translation: And (some) among their fathers and their descendants and their brothers - and We chose them and We guided them to a straight path.

word: وَلِيّ
translation: Guardian/ Supporter

word: فَإِن كَانَ ٱلَّذِي عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوۡ ضَعِيفًا أَوۡ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلۡيُمۡلِلۡ وَلِيُّهُۥ بِٱلۡعَدۡلِۚ
translation: But if the one who has the obligation is of limited understanding or weak or unable to dictate himself, then let his guardian dictate in justice.

word: أَوۡلِيَآء
translation: Guardian/ Supporter

word: لَّا يَتَّخِذِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۖ
translation: Let not believers take disbelievers as allies rather than believers.

word: ذَكَر
translation: Male

word: مَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَنُحۡيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةٗ طَيِّبَةٗۖ
translation: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life,

word: وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
translation: but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise,

word: أُنثَى
translation: Female

word: رَبِّ إِنِّي وَضَعۡتُهَآ أُنثَىٰ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا وَضَعَتۡ وَلَيۡسَ ٱلذَّكَرُ كَٱلۡأُنثَىٰۖ
translation: "My Lord, I have delivered a female." And Allah was most knowing of what she delivered, "And the male is not like the female.

word: وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
translation: but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise,

word: وَجۡه
translation: Face/ Countenance

word: ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِۖ
translation: That is best for those who desire the countenance of Allah,

word: وُجُوه
translation: Faces/ Countenance

word: يَوۡمَ تَبۡيَضُّ وُجُوهٞ وَتَسۡوَدُّ وُجُوهٞۚ
translation: On the Day (some) faces will turn white and (some) faces will turn black.

word: أَبۡصَٰر
translation: Vision

word: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
translation: Indeed in that is a lesson for those of vision.

word: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
translation: Vision perceives Him not, but He perceives (all) vision; and He is the Subtle, the Acquainted.

word: صَدۡر
translation: Breast/chest

word: فَمَن يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَهۡدِيَهُۥ يَشۡرَحۡ صَدۡرَهُۥ لِلۡإِسۡلَٰمِۖ
translation: So whoever Allah wants to guide - He expands his breast to (contain) Islam;

word: كِتَٰبٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِي صَدۡرِكَ حَرَجٞ مِّنۡهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِ
translation: (This is) a Book revealed to you, (O Muhammad) - so let there not be in your breast distress therefrom - that you may warn thereby

word: صُدُور
translation: Breasts/ (chests

word: قُلۡ إِن تُخۡفُواْ مَا فِي صُدُورِكُمۡ أَوۡ تُبۡدُوهُ يَعۡلَمۡهُ ٱللَّهُۗ
translation: Say, "Whether you conceal what is in your breasts or reveal it, Allah knows it.

word: قَلۡب
translation: Heart

word: وَلَوۡ كُنتَ فَظًّا غَلِيظَ ٱلۡقَلۡبِ لَٱنفَضُّواْ مِنۡ حَوۡلِكَۖ
translation: And if you had been rude (in speech) and harsh in heart, they would have disbanded from about you.

word: قُلُوب
translation: Hearts

word: أَلَا بِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطۡمَئِنُّ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ
translation: Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured."

word: نَفۡس
translation: Soul

word: وَلَا تَقۡتُلُواْ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ
translation: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right.

word: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تَمُوتَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّؤَجَّلٗاۗ
translation: And it is not (possible) for one to die except by permission of Allah at a decree determined.

word: أَنفُس
translation: Souls

word: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡخَوۡفِ وَٱلۡجُوعِ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۗ
translation: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits,

word: رُوح
translation: Spirit/ Soul

word: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلرُّوحِۖ قُلِ ٱلرُّوحُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّي
translation: And they ask you, (O Muhammad), about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord.

word: وَءَاتَيۡنَا عِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَيَّدۡنَٰهُ بِرُوحِ ٱلۡقُدُسِۗ
translation: And We gave Jesus, the son of Mary, clear proofs and supported him with the Pure Spirit.

word: قُوة
translation: Power (strength)

word: وَلَوۡ يَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِذۡ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ أَنَّ ٱلۡقُوَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعٗا
translation: And if only they who have wronged would consider (that) when they see the punishment, that all power belongs to Allah

word: وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ
translation: And prepare against them whatever you are able of power and of steeds of war by which you may terrify the enemy of Allah

word: نَاس
translation: People

word: أَكَانَ لِلنَّاسِ عَجَبًا أَنۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ
translation: Have the people been amazed that We revealed [revelation] to a man from among them,

word: قَوۡم
translation: People

word: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
translation: Thus do We recompense the criminal people

word: أُمَّة
translation: Nation

word: وَلۡتَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أُمَّةٞ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ
translation: And let there be [arising] from you a nation inviting to [all that is] good, enjoining what is right,

word: أُمَم
translation: Nations

word: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡبَأۡسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ
translation: And We have already sent [messengers] to nations before you, [O Muhammad]; then We seized them with poverty and hardship

word: إِنسَٰن
translation: Man (mankind)

word: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِ
translation: And when affliction touches man, he calls upon Us to [remove] an affliction that touched him,

word: يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُخَفِّفَ عَنكُمۡۚ وَخُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ ضَعِيفٗا
translation: And Allah wants to lighten for you [your difficulties]; and mankind was created weak.

word: مَلَأ
translation: Eminent (chiefs)

word: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
translation: Said the eminent among his people, "Indeed, we see you in clear error."

word: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ
translation: Said the eminent among the people of Pharaoh, "Indeed, this is a learned magician

word: عَبۡد
translation: Servant

word: وَإِن كُنتُمۡ فِي رَيۡبٖ مِّمَّا نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا فَأۡتُواْ بِسُورَةٖ
translation: And if you are in doubt about what We have sent down upon Our Servant [Muhammad], then produce a surah

word: عِبَاد
translation: Servants

word: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ
translation: And when My servants ask you, [O Muhammad], concerning Me - indeed I am near.

word: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
translation: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

word: عَدُو
translation: Enemy

word: وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
translation: and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.

word: أَعۡدَآء
translation: Enemyies

word: وَٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ كُنتُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ فَأَلَّفَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِكُمۡ
translation: And remember the favor of Allah upon you - when you were enemies and He brought your hearts together

word: مُجۡرِمِين
translation: Criminals

word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
translation: And thus do We detail the verses, and [thus] the way of the criminals will become evident.

word: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا
translation: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."

word: فَرِيق
translation: Party

word: أَفَتَطۡمَعُونَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ لَكُمۡ وَقَدۡ كَانَ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ كَلَٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُحَرِّفُونَهُ
translation: Do you covet [the hope, O believers], that they would believe for you while a party of them used to hear the words of Allah and then distort the Torah

word: أَفَكُلَّمَا جَآءَكُمۡ رَسُولُۢ بِمَا لَا تَهۡوَىٰٓ أَنفُسُكُمُ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ فَفَرِيقٗا كَذَّبۡتُمۡ وَفَرِيقٗا تَقۡتُلُونَ
translation: But is it [not] that every time a messenger came to you, [O Children of Israel], with what your souls did not desire, you were arrogant? And a party [of messengers] you denied and another party you killed.

word: فِئَة
translation: Party / Group

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمۡ فِئَةٗ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا
translation: O you who have believed, when you encounter a company [from the enemy forces], stand firm and remember Allah much

word: طَآئِفَة
translation: Party / Group

word: وَدَّت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَوۡ يُضِلُّونَكُمۡ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ
translation: A faction of the people of the Scripture wish they could mislead you. But they do not mislead except themselves,

word: أَجۡمَعِينَ
translation: All/ Everybody /Everyone

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ  كُفَّارٌ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
translation: Indeed, those who disbelieve and die while they are disbelievers - upon them will be the curse of Allah and of the angels and the people, all together,

word: أَجۡمَعُونَ
translation: All/ Everybody /Everyone

word: فَسَجَدَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعُونَ
translation: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely

word: جَمِيع
translation: All/ Everybody /Everyone

word: أَيۡنَ مَا تَكُونُواْ يَأۡتِ بِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًاۚ
translation: Wherever you may be, Allah will bring you forth [for judgement] all together.

word: سَوَآء
translation: Same/ Equal/ Straight

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
translation: Indeed, those who disbelieve - it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.

word: وَمَن يَتَبَدَّلِ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
translation: And whoever exchanges faith for disbelief has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way.

word: ٱسۡم
translation: Name

word: يَٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ ٱسۡمُهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ
translation: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John.

word: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ جَعَلۡنَا مَنسَكٗا لِّيَذۡكُرُواْ ٱسۡمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم
translation: And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them

word: صَاحِب
translation: Companion Inmate

word: قَالَ لَهُۥ صَاحِبُهُۥ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَكَفَرۡتَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكَ مِن تُرَابٖ
translation: His companion said to him while he was conversing with him, "Have you disbelieved in He who created you from dust

word: أَصۡحَٰب
translation: Companion (Inmates)

word: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ
translation: And those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those will be companions (inmates) of the Fire;

word: فِرۡعَوۡن
translation: Pharaoh

word: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِ
translation: Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment

word: وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
translation: And [recall] when We saved your forefathers from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with the worst torment,

word: نَصَٰرَىٰ
translation: Christians

word: وَقَالُواْ لَن يَدۡخُلَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ إِلَّا مَن كَانَ هُودًا أَوۡ نَصَٰرَىٰۗ
translation: And they say, "None will enter Paradise except one who is a Jew or a Christian."

word: وَقَالَتِ ٱلۡيَهُودُ وَٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰ نَحۡنُ أَبۡنَٰٓؤُاْ ٱللَّهِ وَأَحِبَّٰٓؤُهُۥۚ
translation: But the Jews and the Christians say, "We are the children of Allah and His beloved."

word: نِسَآء
translation: Women/ wives

word: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: O Mary, indeed Allah has chosen you and purified you and chosen you above the women of the worlds.

word: وَيَسۡتَفۡتُونَكَ فِي ٱلنِّسَآءِۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُفۡتِيكُمۡ فِيهِنَّ وَمَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ
translation: And they request from you, [O Muhammad], a [legal] ruling concerning women. Say, Allah gives you a ruling about them and [about] what has been recited to you

word: رِجَال
translation: Men

word: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ إِلَّا رِجَالٗا نُّوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓۗ
translation: And We sent not before you [as messengers] except men to whom We revealed from among the people of cities.

word: وَأَذِّن فِي النَّاسِ بِالْحَجِّ يَأْتُوكَ رِجَالًا وَعَلَىٰ كُلِّ ضَامِرٍ
translation: And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel;

word: عِظَٰم
translation: Bones

word: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمٗا وَرُفَٰتًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ خَلۡقٗا جَدِيدٗا
translation: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation?"

word: فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡعَلَقَةَ مُضۡغَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمُضۡغَةَ عِظَٰمٗا فَكَسَوۡنَا ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ لَحۡمٗا
translation: and We made [from] the clot, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh;

word: مَوۡتَىٰ
translation: The dead

word: فَقُلۡنَا ٱضۡرِبُوهُ بِبَعۡضِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُحۡيِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ
translation: So, We said, "Strike the slain man with part of it." Thus does Allah bring the dead to life, and He shows you His signs

word: وَإِذۡ تُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ بِإِذۡنِيۖ
translation: and when you brought forth the dead with My permission.

word: أَيۡدِي
translation: Hands

word: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُبُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَٰذَا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ
translation: So woe to those who write the "scripture" with their own hands, then say, "This is from Allah,"

word: وَلَن يَتَمَنَّوۡهُ أَبَدَۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
translation: But they will never wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth.

word: أَعۡيُن
translation: Eyes

word: وَإِذَا سَمِعُواْ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ تَرَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمۡعِ مِمَّا عَرَفُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ
translation: And when they hear what has been revealed to the Messenger, you see their eyes overflowing with tears because of what they have recognized of the truth.

word: فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَآءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِيمٖ
translation: and when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people and struck terror into them, and they presented a great [feat of] magic.

word: أَزۡوَٰج
translation: Spouses

word: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡۖ
translation: Gardens of perpetual residence; they will enter them with whoever were righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their descendants.

word: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلٗا مِّن قَبۡلِكَ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا وَذُرِّيَّةٗۚ
translation: And We have already sent messengers before you and assigned to them wives and descendants.

word: أَهۡوَآء
translation: Inclinations/ Desires

word: وَأَنِ ٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَهُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ وَٱحۡذَرۡهُمۡ
translation: And judge, [O Muhammad], between them by what Allah has revealed and do not follow their inclinations and beware of them,

word: قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهۡوَآءَكُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلَلۡتُ إِذٗا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
translation: Say, "I will not follow your desires, for I would then have gone astray, and I would not be of the [rightly] guided."

word: أَلۡبَٰب
translation: Minds/ Understanding

word: وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ
translation: And there is for you in legal retribution [saving of] life, O you [people] of understanding, that you may become righteous.

word: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ مُبَٰرَكٞ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
translation: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.

word: أَبۡوَٰب
translation: Doors/ Gates

word: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖ مُّفَتَّحَةٗ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡوَٰبُ
translation: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.

word: وَرَٰوَدَتۡهُ ٱلَّتِي هُوَ فِي بَيۡتِهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ وَغَلَّقَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡوَٰبَ
translation: And she, in whose house he was, sought to seduce him. She closed the doors

word: أَيۡمَٰن
translation: Oaths

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَشۡتَرُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ ثَمَنٗا قَلِيلًا أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَا خَلَٰقَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ
translation: Indeed, those who exchange the covenant of Allah and their [own] oaths for a small price will have no share in the Hereafter,

word: وَٱلَّذِينَ عَقَدَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُمۡ فَ
translation: And to those whom your oaths have bound [to you] - give them their share.

word: بَدَّلَ
translation: to (Ex)Change

word: وَمَن يُبَدِّلۡ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
translation: «And whoever exchanges the favor of Allah [for disbelief] after it has come to him - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty»

word: فَمَنۢ بَدَّلَهُۥ بَعۡدَ مَا سَمِعَهُۥ فَإِنَّمَآ إِثۡمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَدِّلُونَهُۥٓۚ
translation: «Then whoever alters the bequest after he has heard it - the sin is only upon those who have altered it.»
to Give good news

word: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
translation: «He said, “Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?”»

word: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ
translation: «They said, “We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing.”»

word: بَيَّنَ
translation: to Make clear

word: قَالُواْ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّن لَّنَا مَا هِيَۚ
translation: «They said, “Call upon your Lord to make clear to us what it is.”»

word: ۗ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ
translation: «We have shown clearly the signs to a people who are certain [in faith]»

word: زَيَّنَ
translation: to Decorate (figuratively)/ to Make sth seem good

word: زُيِّنَ  لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَسۡخَرُونَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۘ
translation: «Beautified for those  who disbelieve is the life of this world, and they ridicule those who  believe.»

word: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ
translation: «Indeed, We have  adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars»

word: سَبَّحَ
translation: to Glorify/ Exalt

word: وَسَخَّرۡنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحۡنَ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۚ
translation: «And We subjected the  mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds.»

word: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
translation: «Whatever is in the  heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise»

word: سَخَّرَ
translation: to Subject

word: وَسَخَّرۡنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحۡنَ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۚ
translation: And We subjected the  mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds.»

word: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ
translation: «Indeed, We subjected  the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [Allah] in the [late] afternoon  and [after] sunrise»

word: صَدَّقَ
translation: to Confirm/ to Believe

word: بَلۡ جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
translation: «Rather, the Prophet  has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers»

word: وَءَامِنُواْ بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتُ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا مَعَكُمۡ
translation: «And believe in what  I have sent down confirming that which is [already] with you,»

word: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
translation: «And the disbeliever  had not believed, nor had he prayed»

word: عَذَّبَ
translation: to Torment, to Punish

word: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَأُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ
translation: «And as for those who  disbelieved, I will punish them with a severe punishment in this world and  the Hereafter»

word: عَلَّمَ
translation: to Teach

word: وَعَلَّمَ ءَادَمَ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ
translation: «And He taught Adam  the names - all of them. Then He showed them to the angels»

word: وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُعَلِّمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ ٱلسِّحۡرَ
translation: but the devils  disbelieved, teaching people magic.»

word: قَدَّمَ
translation: to Send forward

word: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّامٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
translation: «That is for what  your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His]  servants.”»

word: وَمَا تُقَدِّمُواْ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَيۡرٖ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ
translation: «and whatever good  you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah.»

word: كَذَّبَ
translation: to Accuse of falsehood/ to Deny

word: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِ
translation: «And those who  disbelieve and deny Our signs - those will be companions of the Fire”»

word: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِ
translation: «And indeed, they do  not call you untruthful, but it is the verses of Allah that the wrongdoers  reject»

word: نَبَّأَ
translation: to Inform, to Declare

word: قُل لَّا  تَعۡتَذِرُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكُمۡ قَدۡ نَبَّأَنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ أَخۡبَارِكُمۡۚ
translation: «Say, “Make no excuse  - never will we believe you. Allah has already informed us of your news.»

word: وَسَوۡفَ يُنَبِّئُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ
translation: «And Allah is going  to inform them about what they used to do»

word: نَزَّلَ
translation: to Send down

word: وَإِن كُنتُمۡ فِي رَيۡبٖ مِّمَّا نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا فَأۡتُواْ بِسُورَةٖ مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ
translation: «And if you are in  doubt about what We have sent down upon Our Servant [Muhammad], then produce  a surah the like thereof.»

word: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتِۢ بَيِّنَٰتٖ
translation: «It is He who sends  down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence.»
to Rescue

word: جَآءَهُمۡ نَصۡرُنَا فَنُجِّيَ مَن نَّشَآءُۖ
translation: «there came to them  Our victory, and whoever We willed was saved.»

word: وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
translation: «And [recall]  when We saved your forefathers from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you  with the worst torment,»
to turn away, to turn

word: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۖ
translation: «Then you turned away  after that.»

word: وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَيَتَّبِعۡ غَيۡرَ سَبِيلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ نُوَلِّهِۦ مَا تَوَلَّىٰ وَنُصۡلِهِۦ جَهَنَّمَۖ
translation: «And whoever opposes  the Messenger after guidance has become clear to him and follows other than  the way of the believers - We will give him what he has taken and drive him  into Hell»

word: جَٰهَدَ
translation: to Struggle/ to Strive

word: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: «And whoever strives only strives for [the benefit of] himself. Indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds»

word: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
translation: «And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient»

word: قَٰتَلَ
translation: to Fight

word: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن نَّبِيّٖ قَٰتَلَ مَعَهُۥ رِبِّيُّونَ كَثِيرٞ
translation: «And how many a prophet [fought and] with him fought many religious scholars.

word: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡتَدُوٓاْۚ
translation: «Fight in the way of Allah those who fight you but do not transgress»

word: نَادَىٰ
translation: to Call out/ to Cry unto

word: وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٞ رَّبَّهُۥ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ ٱبۡنِي مِنۡ أَهۡلِي
translation: «And Noah called to his Lord and said, “My Lord, indeed my son is of my family»

word: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا
translation: «And We called him from the side of the mount at [his] right and brought him near, confiding [to him]»

word: رَّبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا سَمِعۡنَا مُنَادِيٗا يُنَادِي لِلۡإِيمَٰنِ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِرَبِّكُمۡ فَ
translation: «Our Lord, indeed we have heard a caller calling to faith, [saying], ‘Believe in your Lord,’ and we have believed.

word: نَافَقَ
translation: to Play hypocrisy

word: وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُواْۚ وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡاْ قَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَوِ ٱدۡفَعُواْۖ
translation: «And that He might make evident those who are hypocrites. For it was said to them, “Come, fight in the way of Allah or [at least] defend.”

word: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
translation: «Give tidings to the hypocrites that there is for them a painful punishment»

word: هَاجَرَ
translation: to Migrate

word: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا فُتِنُواْ ثُمَّ جَٰهَدُواْ وَصَبَرُوٓاْ
translation: «Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient

word: فَلَا تَتَّخِذُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: So do not take from among them allies until they emigrate for the cause of Allah.

word: أَبصَرَ
translation: to See/ to Watch

word: قَدۡ جَآءَكُم بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ فَمَنۡ أَبۡصَرَ فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ
translation: «There has come to you enlightenment from your Lord. So whoever will see does so for [the benefit of] his soul,»

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَٰٓئِفٞ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُواْ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبۡصِرُونَ
translation: «Indeed, those who fear Allah - when an impulse touches them from Satan, they remember [Him] and at once they have insight»

word: أَحسَنَ
translation: to Do good

word: وَأَنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تُلۡقُواْ بِأَيۡدِيكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلتَّهۡلُكَةِ وَأَحۡسِنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
translation: «And spend in the way of Allah and do not throw [yourselves] with your [own] hands into destruction [by refraining]. And do good; indeed, Allah loves the doers of good»

word: وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا
translation: «.. while they think that they are doing well in work.”»

word: أَخۡرَجَ
translation: to Bring out/ forth

word: قَالَ فَٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٞ
translation: «[Allah] said, “Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled»

word: أَيَعِدُكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ إِذَا مِتُّمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخۡرَجُونَ
translation: «Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?»

word: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
translation: «Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading»

word: أَدخَلَ
translation: to Admit (someone) into..

word: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ
translation: «And We admitted him into Our mercy»

word: وَأُدۡخِلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٖ
translation: «And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens»

word: أَرۡجَعَ
translation: to Return

word: ٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيكُمۡ فَقُولُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّ ٱبۡنَكَ سَرَقَ
translation: «Return to your father and say, “O our father, indeed your son has stolen, »

word: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
translation: «Deaf, dumb and blind - so they will not return [to the right path]»

word: أَرۡسَلَ
translation: to Send

word: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗاۖ
translation: «Indeed, We have sent you, [O Muhammad], with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner, »

word: قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
translation: «[Abraham] said, “Then what is your business [here], O messengers?”»

word: أَسۡرَفَ
translation: to Be extravagant

word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِ
translation: «And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. »

word: قَالُواْ طَٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمۡ أَئِن ذُكِّرۡتُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ
translation: «They said, “Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people.”»

word: أَسۡلَمَ
translation: to Submit/ Surrender

word: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ وَجۡهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ فَلَهُۥٓ أَجۡرُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ
translation: «Yes [on the contrary], whoever submits his face in Islam to Allah while being a doer of good will have his reward with his Lord.»

word: قَالَ ٱلۡحَوَارِيُّونَ نَحۡنُ أَنصَارُ ٱللَّهِ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَٱشۡهَدۡ بِأَنَّا مُسۡلِمُونَ
translation: The disciples said, “We are supporters for Allah. We have believed in Allah and testify that we are Muslims [submitting to Him]

word: أَشۡرَكَ
translation: to Associate a partner

word: وَلَتَجِدَنَّهُمۡ أَحۡرَصَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ حَيَوٰةٖ وَمِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُواْۚ
translation: «And you will surely find them the most greedy of people for life - [even] more than those who associate others with Allah.»

word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَغۡفِرُ أَن يُشۡرَكَ بِهِۦ وَيَغۡفِرُ مَا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن يَشَآءُۚ
translation: «Indeed, Allah does not forgive association with Him, but He forgives what is less than that for whom He wills.»

word: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ
translation: «And most of them believe not in Allah except while they associate others with Him»

word: أَصۡبَحَ
translation: to Become

word: فَطَوَّعَتۡ لَهُۥ نَفۡسُهُۥ قَتۡلَ أَخِيهِ فَقَتَلَهُۥ فَأَصۡبَحَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
translation: «And his soul permitted to him the murder of his brother, so he killed him and became among the losers»

word: أَوۡ يُصۡبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوۡرٗا فَلَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبٗا
translation: «Or its water will become sunken [into the earth], so you would never be able to seek it.”»

word: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ مُصۡبِحِينَ
translation: «But the shriek seized them at early morning»

word: أَصۡلَحَ
translation: to Become good

word: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ وَبَيَّنُواْ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
translation: «Except for those who repent and correct themselves and make evident [what they concealed]. Those - I will accept their repentance, »

word: وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ
translation: and establish prayer - indeed, We will not allow to be lost the reward of the reformers»

word: أَعۡرَضَ
translation: to Turn away

word: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا
translation: «And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life»

word: ۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
translation: And if He had made them hear, they would [still] have turned away, while they were refusing»

word: أَغۡرَقَ
translation: to Drown

word: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
translation: «And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all»

word: وَلَا تُخَٰطِبۡنِي فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِنَّهُم مُّغۡرَقُونَ
translation: and do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are [to be] drowned.”»To Spread Corruption

word: أَفۡسَدَ
translation: To Spread Corruption

word: قَالَتۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُواْ قَرۡيَةً أَفۡسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓاْ أَعِزَّةَ أَهۡلِهَآ أَذِلَّةٗۚ
translation: «She said, “Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled.»

word: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ
translation: «Unquestionably, it is they who are the corrupters, but they perceive [it] not»

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
translation: «Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend.”»

word: أَفۡلَحَ
translation: To Succeed

word: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
translation: «He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself»

word: إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
translation: Indeed, the wrongdoers will not succeed»

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
translation: «Those are upon [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful»

word: أَنۢبَتَ
translation: to Make sth Grow

word: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا حَبّٗا
translation: «And caused to grow within it grain»

word: يُنۢبِتُ لَكُم بِهِ ٱلزَّرۡعَ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونَ وَٱلنَّخِيلَ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَٰبَ وَمِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۚ
translation: «He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits.»

word: أَنذَرَ
translation: to Warn

word: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا
translation: «And to warn those who say, “Allah has taken a son.”»

word: وَأَنذِرۡ عَشِيرَتَكَ ٱلۡأَقۡرَبِينَ
translation: «And warn, (O Muhammad), your closest kindred»

word: أَنزَلَ
translation: to Send Down

word: أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَسَالَتۡ أَوۡدِيَةُۢ بِقَدَرِهَا
translation: «He sends down from the sky, rain, and valleys flow according to their capacity»

word: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ
translation: «And say, ‘My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate (us).’»

word: أَنشَأَ
translation: to Create/ Produce

word: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
translation: «Then We produced after them a generation of others»

word: ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ يُنشِئُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۚ
translation: Then Allah will produce the final creation.»

word: أَنعَمَ
translation: to Favor/ bestow Grace

word: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
translation: «The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor»

word: وَإِذَآ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَ
translation: «And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself;»

word: أَنفَقَ
translation: to Spend

word: وَمَآ أَنفَقۡتُم مِّن نَّفَقَةٍ أَوۡ نَذَرۡتُم مِّن نَّذۡرٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُهُۥۗ
translation: «And whatever you spend of expenditures or make of vows - indeed, Allah knows of it.»

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
translation: «Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them»

word: أَهۡلَكَ
translation: to Destroy

word: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهۡلَكَ عَادًا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
translation: «And that He destroyed the first (people of) ‘Aad»

word: وَإِن يُهۡلِكُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
translation: And they do not destroy except themselves, but they perceive (it) not»

word: أَخۡفَىٰ
translation: to Conceal

word: بَلۡ بَدَا لَهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُخۡفُونَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ
translation: «But what they concealed before has (now) appeared to them.»

word: فَلَا تَعۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أُخۡفِيَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعۡيُنٖ جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
translation: «And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do»

word: أَغۡنَىٰ
translation: to Avail/ aid

word: فَمَآ أَغۡنَتۡ عَنۡهُمۡ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِي يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ
translation: «And they were not availed at all by their gods which they invoked other than Allah when there came the command of your Lord.»

word: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
translation: «(But having) no cool shade and availing not against the flame.”»

word: أَلۡقَىٰ
translation: to Throw/Cast /Place

word: وَأَلۡقَيۡتُ عَلَيۡكَ مَحَبَّةٗ مِّنِّي وَلِتُصۡنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيۡنِيٓ
translation: «And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye»

word: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
translation: «They said, “Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire.”»

word: أَنجَىٰ
translation: to Rescue/ Save/ Deliver

word: فَأَنجَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِۚ
translation: «But Allah saved him from the fire.»

word: وَإِذۡ فَرَقۡنَا بِكُمُ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰكُمۡ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ
translation: «And (recall) when We parted the sea for you and (We) saved you and drowned the people of Pharaoh »

word: أَوۡحَىٰ
translation: to Reveal/ Inspire

word: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۖ
translation: «And We inspired to Moses, “Throw your staff,”»

word: تِلۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهَآ إِلَيۡكَۖ
translation: «That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal to you, (O Muhammad)»

word: أَوۡفَىٰ
translation: to Fulfill

word: يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتِيَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَوۡفُواْ بِعَهۡدِيٓ أُوفِ بِعَهۡدِكُمۡ
translation: «O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I have bestowed upon you and fulfill My covenant (upon you) that I will fulfill your covenant (from Me) »

word: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: «But yes, whoever fulfills his commitment and fears Allah - then indeed, Allah loves those who fear Him»

word: أَحۡيَا
translation: To Make alive/ Save

word: مَن قَتَلَ نَفۡسَۢا بِغَيۡرِ نَفۡسٍ أَوۡ فَسَادٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَكَأَنَّمَا قَتَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ جَمِيعٗا وَمَنۡ أَحۡيَاهَا فَكَأَنَّمَآ أَحۡيَا ٱلنَّاسَ جَمِيعٗاۚ
translation: «Whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption (done) in the land - it is as if he had slain mankind entirely. And whoever saves one - it is as if he had saved mankind entirely. »

word: وَٱللَّهُ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۗ
translation: «And it is Allah who gives life and causes death»

word: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
translation: «That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead»

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاهَا لَمُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰٓۚ
translation: «Indeed, He who has given it life is the Giver of Life to the dead.»

word: تَفَكَّرَ
translation: To ponder (think) over/ reflect

word: فَٱقۡصُصِ ٱلۡقَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
translation: So relate the stories that perhaps they will give thought

word: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
translation: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.

word: تَذَكَّرَ
translation: to Remember

word: أَوَ لَمۡ نُعَمِّرۡكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ
translation: «But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, »

word: ۚ وَسِعَ رَبِّي كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمًاۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ
translation: «My Lord encompasses all things in knowledge; then will you not remember?»

word: تَوَكَّّلَ
translation: to Rely on

word: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
translation: «And upon Allah let those who would rely (indeed) rely.»

word: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
translation: «So rely upon Allah; indeed, you are upon the clear truth»

word: تَبَيَّنَ
translation: to Become clear

word: فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥ قَالَ أَعۡلَمُ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
translation: «And when it became clear to him, he said, “I know that Allah is over all things competent.”»

word: حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَتَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
translation: «until it was evident to you who were truthful and you knew (who were) the liars»

word: تَرَبَّصَ
translation: to Wait/ Watch for opportunity

word: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ
translation: «Say, “Each (of us) is waiting; so wait.»

word: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
translation: «He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time.”»

word: تَوَلَّّى
translation: to turn away/ to take for a friend

word: وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا
translation: «but those who turn away - We have not sent you over them as a guardian»

word: تَرَىٰ كَثِيرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ
translation: «You see many of them becoming allies of those who disbelieved. »

word: تَوَفَّّى
translation: to take/ to receive in full

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ ظَالِمِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ قَالُواْ فِيمَ كُنتُمۡۖ
translation: «Indeed, those whom the angels take (in death) while wronging themselves - (the angels) will say, “In what (condition) were you?”»

word: ۖ ثُمَّ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
translation: «Then every soul will be compensated for what it earned, and they will not be treated unjustly»

word: تَبَارَكَ
translation: To be blessed/ exalted

word: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
translation: «Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent»

word: فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقِينَ
translation: «So blessed is Allah, the best of creators»

word: تَسَاءَلَ
translation: to Wonder

word: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
translation: «About what are they asking one another?»

word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِيَتَسَآءَلُواْ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ
translation: «And similarly, We awakened them that they might question one another.

word: ٱنَۡقَلَبَ
translation: to Return/ Turn around

word: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ
translation: «And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting»

word: وَلَا تَرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَارِكُمۡ فَتَنقَلِبُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ
translation: «and do not turn back (from fighting in Allah ‘s cause) and (thus) become losers.”»

word: ٱنَۡتَهى
translation: to Desist/ Cease

word: فَمَن جَآءَهُۥ مَوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ فَٱنتَهَىٰ فَلَهُۥ مَا سَلَفَ وَأَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ
translation: «So whoever has received an admonition from his Lord and desists may have what is past, and his affair rests with Allah. »

word: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
translation: «And if they cease, then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful»

word: ٱخۡتَلَفَ
translation: to Differ/ Alternate

word: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَفِي شِقَاقِۢ بَعِيدٖ
translation: «And indeed, those who differ over the Book are in extreme dissension»

word: إِنَّ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
translation: «Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding»

word: ٱتَّبَعَ
translation: to Follow

word: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ
translation: «And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord.»

word: إِذۡ تَبَرَّأَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتُّبِعُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُواْ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ
translation: «(And they should consider that) when those who have been followed disassociate themselves from those who followed (them)»

word: ٱتَّّخَذَ
translation: to Take as

word: وَإِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ
translation: «And (recall) when We made an appointment with Moses for forty nights. Then you took (for worship) the calf after him,»

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَتَّخِذُواْ ٱلۡيَهُودَ وَٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۘ
translation: O you who have believed, do not take the Jews and the Christians as allies.

word: ٱتَّقَى
translation: to Fear Allah
