word: وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ
translation: «And there is for you in legal retribution (saving of) life, O you (people) of understanding, that you may become righteous»

word: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
translation: «As for he who gives and fears Allah»

word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: «This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah»

word: ٱهۡتَدى
translation: to Be guided/ Follow the right path

word: فَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهۡتَدِي لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ
translation: «so whoever is guided is only guided for (the benefit of) his soul»

word: وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدُونَ
translation: And it is those who are the (rightly) guided»

word: ٱبۡتَغِى
translation: To seek

word: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
translation: «But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors»

word: ۚ أَيَبۡتَغُونَ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ فَإِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعٗا
translation: Do they seek with them honor (through power)? But indeed, honor belongs to Allah entirely»

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ يَبۡتَغُونَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمُ ٱلۡوَسِيلَةَ
translation: «Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, »

word: ٱسۡوَدَّ
translation: to Become black

word: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡوَدَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ أَكَفَرۡتُم بَعۡدَ إِيمَٰنِكُمۡ ف
translation: «As for those whose faces turn black, (to them it will be said), “Did you disbelieve after your belief?»

word: ٱبۡيَضَّ
translation: to Become white

word: يَوۡمَ تَبۡيَضُّ وُجُوهٞ وَتَسۡوَدُّ وُجُوهٞۚ
translation: «On the Day (some) faces will turn white and (some) faces will turn black. »

word: وَقَالَ يَٰٓأَسَفَىٰ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَٱبۡيَضَّتۡ عَيۡنَاهُ مِنَ ٱلۡحُزۡنِ فَهُوَ كَظِيمٞ
translation: «and said, “Oh, my sorrow over Joseph,” and his eyes became white from grief, for he was (of that) a suppressor»

word: ٱخۡضَرَّ
translation: to Become green

word: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَتُصۡبِحُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةًۚ
translation: «Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green?»

word: ٱسۡتَعۡجَلَ
translation: to Be impatient/ Urge impatiently

word: قَالُواْ هَٰذَا عَارِضٞ مُّمۡطِرُنَاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ مَا ٱسۡتَعۡجَلۡتُم بِهِۦۖ
translation: «they said, “This is a cloud bringing us rain!” Rather, it is that for which you were impatient »

word: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَلَوۡلَآ أَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى لَّجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ
translation: «And they urge you to hasten the punishment. And if not for (the decree of) a specified term, punishment would have reached them.

word: ٱسۡتَغۡفَرَ
translation: to Seek forgiveness

word: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
translation: «and Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness»

word: وَبِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ هُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
translation: «And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness»

word: ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ
translation: to Be arrogant

word: فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
translation: «so they prostrated, except for Iblees. He refused and was arrogant and became of the disbelievers»

word: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
translation: «so this Day you will be awarded the punishment of (extreme) humiliation because you were arrogant upon the earth without right »

word: ٱسۡتَهۡزَأَ
translation: to Mock/ Ridicule

word: فَسَوۡفَ يَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
translation: «but there is going to reach them the news of what they used to ridicule»

word: قُلِ ٱسۡتَهۡزِءُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡرِجٞ مَّا تَحۡذَرُونَ
translation: «Say, “Mock (as you wish); indeed, Allah will expose that which you fear.»

word: وَلَقَدِ ٱسۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُلٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ
translation: ««And already were messengers ridiculed before you»

word: ٱسۡتَجَابَِ
translation: to Respond/ Accept

word: لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لِرَبِّهِمُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُۥ لَوۡ أَنَّ لَهُم مَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفۡتَدَوۡاْ بِهِۦٓۚ
translation: «For those who have responded to their Lord is the best (reward), but those who did not respond to Him - if they had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would (attempt to) ransom themselves thereby. »

word: ٱسۡتَطَٰعَ
translation: to Be able to

word: وَلِلَّهِ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ حِجُّ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَاعَ إِلَيۡهِ سَبِيلٗاۚ
translation: «And (due) to Allah from the people is a pilgrimage to the House - for whoever is able to find thereto a way. »

word: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ
translation: «And they were unable to arise, nor couldthey defend themselves»

word: ٱسۡتَقَٰمَ
translation: to Be on the right path

word: فَمَا ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ لَكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَقِيمُواْ لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: «So as long as they are upright toward you, be upright toward them. Indeed, Allah loves the righteous (who fear Him)»

word: ٱهۡدِنَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ
translation: «Guide us to the straight path»

word: فَتَحَ
translation: to Judge/ Open/ Give victory

word: رَبَّنَا ٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَ قَوۡمِنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡفَٰتِحِينَ
translation: «Our Lord, decide between us and our people in truth, and You are the best of those who give decision.»

word: فَلَمَّا نَسُواْ مَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِهِۦ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَبۡوَٰبَ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ
translation: «So when they forgot that by which they had been reminded, We opened to them the doors of every (good) thing»

word: بَعَثَ
translation: to Send/ to Resurrect

word: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
translation: «Then We revived you after your death that perhaps you would be grateful»

word: كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيِّ
translation: «Mankind was (of) one religion (before their deviation); then Allah sent the prophets as bringers of good tidings and warners »

word: جَعَلَ
translation: to Make

word: فَأَعِينُونِي بِقُوَّةٍ أَجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ رَدۡمًا
translation: «but assist me with strength; I will make between you and them a dam»

word: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗاۚ
translation: ««And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop; then He made you mates.»

word: جَمَعَ
translation: to Gather

word: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَٰتِ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
translation: «So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day.»

word: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوۡمٖ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ
translation: «Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt.»

word: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلۡ أَنتُم مُّجۡتَمِعُونَ
translation: «And it was said to the people, “Will you congregate»

word: رَفَعَ
translation: to Raise

word: وَإِذۡ يَرۡفَعُ إِبۡرَٰهِ
translation: «And (mention) when Abraham was raising the foundations of the House and (with him) Ishmael, »

word: إِذۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَٰعِيسَىٰٓ إِنِّي مُتَوَفِّيكَ وَرَافِعُكَ إِلَيَّ وَمُطَهِّرُكَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ
translation: «(Mention) when Allah said, “O Jesus, indeed I will take you and raise you to Myself and purify you from those who disbelieve»

word: سَحَرَ
translation: to Enchant/ Bewitch

word: قَالَ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ
translation: «He said, “Throw,” and when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people and struck terror into them,»

word: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ
translation: «Said the eminent among the people of Pharaoh, “Indeed, this is a learned magician»

word: لَعَنَ
translation: to Curse

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُمُونَ مَآ أَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلۡهُدَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا بَيَّنَّٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَلۡعَنُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَيَلۡعَنُهُمُ ٱللَّٰعِنُونَ
translation: «Indeed, those who conceal what We sent down of clear proofs and guidance after We made it clear for the people in the Scripture - those are cursed by Allah and cursed by those who curse»

word: لُعِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۢ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ لِسَانِ دَاوُۥدَ وَعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَۚ
translation: «Cursed were those who disbelieved among the Children of Israel by the tongue of David and of Jesus, the son of Mary. »

word: نَفَعَ
translation: to Benefit

word: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا
translation: «That Day, no intercession will benefit except (that of) one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word»

word: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ
translation: «But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment.»

word: ذَهَبَ
translation: to Go/ Do away

word: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأۡتِ بِ
translation: «If He wills, He can do away with you, O people, and bring others (in your place).»

word: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّا ذَهَبۡنَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِندَ مَتَٰعِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُۖ
translation: «They said, “O our father, indeed we went racing each other and left Joseph with our possessions, and a wolf ate him.

word: صَلَحَ
translation: to Make amends/ Act righteously

word: سَيَهۡدِيهِمۡ وَيُصۡلِحُ بَالَهُمۡ
translation: «He will guide them and amend their condition»

word: وَقَطَّعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُمَمٗاۖ مِّنۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنۡهُمۡ دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ
translation: «And We divided them throughout the earth into nations. Of them some were righteous, and of them some were otherwise. »

word: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
translation: «And there were in the city nine family heads causing corruption in the land and not amending (its affairs)»

word: نَصَرَ
translation: to Help/ Deliver

word: وَلَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِبَدۡرٖ وَأَنتُمۡ أَذِلَّةٞۖ
translation: «And already had Allah given you victory at (the battle of) Badr while you were few in number.»

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ
translation: «O you who have believed, if you support Allah, He will support you and plant firmly your feet»

word: تَرَكَ
translation: to Leave/ Let

word: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتۡرَكَ سُدًى
translation: «Does man think that he will be left neglected?»

word: ذَهَبَ ٱللَّهُ بِنُورِهِمۡ وَتَرَكَهُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتٖ لَّا يُبۡصِرُونَ
translation: Allah took away their light and left them in darkness (so) they could not see»

word: حَشَرَ
translation: to Gather

word: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا يَٰمَعۡشَرَ ٱلۡجِنِّ قَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡثَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِۖ
translation: «And (mention, O Muhammad), the Day when He will gather them together (and say), “O company of jinn, you have (misled) many of mankind.”»

word: وَيَوۡمَ يُحۡشَرُ أَعۡدَآءُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
translation: «And (mention, O Muhammad), the Day when the enemies of Allah will be gathered to the Fire while they are (driven) assembled in rows»

word: خَلَقَ
translation: to Create

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمۡ
translation: «O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you »

word: إِنَّ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
translation: «Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding»

word: مَكَرَ
translation: to Plot/ Plan

word: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
translation: «And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not»

word: وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ
translation: «But they plan, and Allah plans. And Allah is the best of planners»

word: قَتَلَ
translation: to Kill

word: فَلَمۡ تَقۡتُلُوهُمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَتَلَهُمۡۚ
translation: «And you did not kill them, but it was Allah who killed them. »

word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَقۡتُلُواْ ٱلصَّيۡدَ وَأَنتُمۡ حُرُمٞۚ
translation: «O you who have believed, do not kill game while you are in the state of ihram.

word: بَلَغَ
translation: to Reach

word: وَلَا تَعۡزِمُواْ عُقۡدَةَ ٱلنِّكَاحِ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ أَجَلَهُۥۚ
translation: «And do not determine to undertake a marriage contract until the decreed period reaches its end. »

word: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ مَالَ ٱلۡيَتِيمِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡلُغَ أَشُدَّهُۥۚ
translation: «And do not approach the orphan’s property except in a way that is best until he reaches maturity.»

word: خَرَجَ
translation: to Come out/ Emerge

word: وَمَا هُم بِخَٰرِجِينَ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: «And they are never to emerge from the Fire»

word: كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَآ أُعِيدُواْ فِيهَا
translation: «Every time they wish to emerge from it, they will be returned to it »

word: خَلَدَ
translation: to Live forever

word: يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخۡلُدۡ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا
translation: «Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated»

word: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ
translation: «Then it will be said to those who had wronged, “Taste the punishment of eternity»

word: دَخَلَ
translation: to Enter

word: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّ فِيهَا قَوۡمٗا جَبَّارِينَ وَإِنَّا لَن نَّدۡخُلَهَا حَتَّىٰ يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَا فَإِن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَا فَإِنَّا دَٰخِلُونَ
translation: «They said, “O Moses, indeed within it is a people of tyrannical strength, and indeed, we will never enter it until they leave it; but if they leave it, then we will enter.”»

word: ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ
translation: «Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein»

word: سَجَدَ
translation: to Prostrate

word: لَا تَسۡجُدُواْ لِلشَّمۡسِ وَلَا لِلۡقَمَرِ وَٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِۤ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَهُنَّ
translation: «Do not prostrate to the sun or to the moon, but prostate to Allah, who created them,»

word: وَٱلنَّجۡمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ يَسۡجُدَانِ
translation: «And the stars and trees prostrate»

word: شَعَرَ
translation: to Perceive

word: وَمَا يَخۡدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
translation: «but they deceive not except themselves and perceive (it) not»

word: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ
translation: «Their account is only upon my Lord, if you (could) perceive»

word: قَعَدَ
translation: to Sit/ Remain behind (in battle)

word: وَلَٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمۡ فَثَبَّطَهُمۡ وَقِيلَ ٱقۡعُدُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ
translation: «But Allah disliked their being sent, so He kept them back, and they were told, “Remain (behind) with those who remain.”»

word: وَلَا تَقۡعُدُواْ بِكُلِّ صِرَٰطٖ تُوعِدُونَ وَتَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
translation: «And do not sit on every path, threatening and averting from the way of Allah those who believe in Him, »

word: ذَكَرَ
translation: to Remember

word: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَ
translation: «This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return»

word: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ لَا يَذۡكُرُونَ
translation: «And when they are reminded, they remember not»

word: رَزَقَ
translation: to Provide

word: قُلۡ مَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُۖ
translation: «Say, “Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?” Say, “Allah.»

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
translation: «Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them»

word: صَدَقَ
translation: to Say the truth

word: وَٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ
translation: «And the one who has brought the truth and (they who) believed in it - those are the righteous»

word: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ
translation: «Say, “Allah has told the truth. So follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; »

word: فَسَقَ
translation: to Transgress

word: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
translation: «And whoever turned away after that - they were the defiantly disobedient»

word: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِ
translation: «But those who deny Our verses - the punishment will touch them for their defiant disobedience»

word: حَكَمَ
translation: to Judge/ Rule

word: ۚ وَمَن لَّمۡ يَحۡكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
translation: «And whoever does not judge by what Allah has revealed - then it is those who are the defiantly disobedient»

word: فَإِن جَآءُوكَ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ أَوۡ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡۖ
translation: «So if they come to you, (O Muhammad), judge between them or turn away from them. And if you turn away from them»

word: شَكَرَ
translation: to Be grateful

word: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا لُقۡمَٰنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ أَنِ ٱشۡكُرۡ لِلَّهِۚ وَمَن يَشۡكُرۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ
translation: «And We had certainly given 31 wisdom (and said), “Be grateful to Allah.” And whoever is grateful, is grateful for (the benefit of) himself. »

word: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
translation: «Rather, worship (only) Allah and be among the grateful»

word: كَفَرَ
translation: to Disbelieve/ Deny

word: وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: But whoever disbelieves - then indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds»

word: فَٱذۡكُرُونِيٓ أَذۡكُرۡكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِي وَلَا تَكۡفُرُونِ
translation: «So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me»

word: عَبَدَ
translation: to Worship

word: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ
translation: «Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance»

word: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُمۡ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ
translation: «And they worship other than Allah that which neither harms them nor benefits them,»

word: كَتَبَ
translation: to Write/ Assign

word: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ
translation: «Allah has written, “I will surely overcome, I and My messengers.” »

word: وَكَتَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡعِظَةٗ
translation: «And We wrote for him on the tablets (something) of all things»

word: يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسَةَ ٱلَّتِي كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ
translation: «O my people, enter the Holy Land which Allah has assigned to you»

word: كُتِبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡقِتَالُ وَهُوَ كُرۡهٞ لَّكُمۡۖ
translation: «Fighting has been enjoined upon you while it is hateful to you.»

word: نَظَرَ
translation: to Look/ Await

word: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي ظُلَلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡغَمَامِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُۚ
translation: «Do they await but that Allah should come to them in covers of clouds and the angels (as well) and the matter is (then) decided?»

word: فَأَخَذَتۡكُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ
translation: «so the thunderbolt took you while you were looking on»

word: ضَرَبَ
translation: to Present/ Strike

word: ضَرَبَ لَكُم مَّثَلٗا مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡ
translation: «He presents to you an example from yourselves.»

word: وَإِذِ ٱسۡتَسۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِۦ فَقُلۡنَا ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡحَجَرَ
translation: «And (recall) when Moses prayed for water for his people, so We said, “Strike with your staff the stone.”»

word: حَمَلَ
translation: to Carry

word: فَلَمَّا تَغَشَّىٰهَا حَمَلَتۡ حَمۡلًا خَفِيفٗا فَمَرَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ
translation: «And when he covers her, she carries a light burden and continues therein.»

word: فَحَمَلَتۡهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتۡ بِهِۦ مَكَانٗا قَصِيّٗا
translation: «So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place»

word: صَبَرَ
translation: to Endure/ Be Patient

word: فَٱصۡبِرۡ صَبۡرٗا جَمِيلًا
translation: «So be patient with gracious patience»

word: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّٰبِرُونَ أَجۡرَهُم بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
translation: Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account.”»

word: عَقَلَ
translation: to Understand/Use Reason

word: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ
translation: «And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge»

word: أَوَلَوۡ كَانَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ شَيۡ
translation: Even though their fathers understood nothing, nor were they guided?»

word: قَدَرَ
translation: to Have power over/to Destine

word: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
translation: «Is not that (Creator) Able to give life to the dead?»

word: لَّا يَقۡدِرُونَ مِمَّا كَسَبُواْ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ
translation: «they are unable (to keep) from what they earned a (single) thing.»

word: كَسَبَ
translation: to Earn

word: وَمَن يَكۡسِبۡ إِثۡمٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَكۡسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۚ
translation: «And whoever commits a sin only earns it against himself.»

word: هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ
translation: «are you being recompensed except for what you used to earn?”»

word: ظَلَمَ
translation: to Wrong

word: وَمَا ظَلَمَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
translation: «And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves»

word: رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُدۡنَا فَإِنَّا ظَٰلِمُونَ
translation: «Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return (to evil), we would indeed be wrongdoers.»

word: مَلَكَ
translation: to Possess/ Rule over

word: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا
translation: «Or have they a share of dominion? Then (if that were so), they would not give the people (even as much as) the speck on a date seed»

word: أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَلَّا يَرۡجِعُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَوۡلٗا وَلَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعٗا
translation: «Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?»

word: غَفَرَ
translation: to Forgive

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَٱلۡعَذَابَ بِٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ
translation: «Those are the ones who have exchanged guidance for error and forgiveness for punishment.»

word: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ
translation: «Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. »

word: عَرَفَ
translation: to Know/ Recognize

word: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَعۡرِفُونَهُۥ كَمَا يَعۡرِفُونَ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ
translation: «Those to whom We gave the Scripture know him as they know their own sons.»

word: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم مَّا عَرَفُواْ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦۚ
translation: «But (then) when there came to them that which they recognized, they disbelieved in it;»

word: كَذَبَ
translation: to Lie

word: إِنَّمَا يَفۡتَرِي ٱلۡكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ
translation: «They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah,»

word: فَأَعۡقَبَهُمۡ نِفَاقٗا فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخۡلَفُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡذِبُونَ
translation: «So He penalized them with hypocrisy in their hearts until the Day they will meet Him - because they failed Allah in what they promised Him and because they (habitually) used to lie»

word: سَمِعَ
translation: to Hear

word: خَتَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَعَلَىٰ سَمۡعِهِمۡ
translation: «Allah has set a seal upon their hearts and upon their hearing»

word: وَقَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَأَطَعۡنَاۖ غُفۡرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
translation: And they say, “We hear and we obey. (We seek) Your forgiveness, our Lord, and to You is the (final) destination.”»

word: حَسِبَ
translation: to Think

word: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخۡرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضۡغَٰنَهُمۡ
translation: «Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their (feelings of) hatred?»

word: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ
translation: «Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?»

word: حَزِنَ
translation: to Grieve

word: فَمَن تَبِعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
translation: «Whoever follows My guidance - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve»

word: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشۡكُواْ بَثِّي وَحُزۡنِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ
translation: «He said, “I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah,»

word: خَسِرَ
translation: to Lose/ Sustain a loss

word: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَأَهۡلِيهِمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ
translation: «Say, “Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection.»

word: أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡخُسۡرَانُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
translation: «Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss.”»

word: حَفِظَ
translation: to Protect

word: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
translation: «Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur’an and indeed, We will be its guardian»

word: وَحِفۡظٗا مِّن كُلِّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ مَّارِدٖ
translation: «And as protection against every rebellious devil»

word: عَلِمَ
translation: to Know

word: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٗا
translation: «Allah knows what is (presently) before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge»

word: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ
translation: «Do you not know that to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth»

word: كَرِهَ
translation: to Hate

word: وَيَجۡعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ مَا يَكۡرَهُونَ
translation: «And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike»

word: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
translation: «That He should establish the truth and abolish falsehood, even if the criminals disliked it»

word: عَمِلَ
translation: to Work/ Do a deed

word: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
translation: «So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it»

word: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلٗا صَٰلِحٗا
translation: «Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work»

word: رَحِمَ
translation: to Have mercy on

word: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ
translation: «He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned»

word: شَهِدَ
translation: to Witness

word: قَالَ هِيَ رَٰوَدَتۡنِي عَن نَّفۡسِيۚ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَآ
translation: «(Joseph) said, “It was she who sought to seduce me.” And a witness from her family testified.»

word: وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ
translation: «And that is a Day (which will be) witnessed»

word: رَدَّ
translation: to Return

word: وَرَدَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِغَيۡظِهِمۡ لَمۡ يَنَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۚ
translation: «And Allah repelled those who disbelieved, in their rage, not having obtained any good.»

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِي فَرَضَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لَرَآدُّكَ إِلَىٰ مَعَادٖۚ
translation: «Indeed, (O Muhammad), He who imposed upon you the Qur’an will take you back to a place of return.»

word: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ
translation: «Then they His servants are returned to Allah, their true Lord.»

word: صَدَّ
translation: to Avert

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدًا
translation: «Indeed, those who disbelieve and avert (people) from the way of Allah have certainly gone far astray»

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا
translation: «Who averted (people) from the way of Allah and sought to make it (seem) deviant»

word: ضَرَّ
translation: to Harm

word: قُل لَّآ أَمۡلِكُ لِنَفۡسِي نَفۡعٗا وَلَا ضَرًّا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ
translation: «Say, “I hold not for myself (the power of) benefit or harm, except what Allah has willed.»

word: لَن يَضُرُّوكُمۡ إِلَّآ أَذٗىۖ
translation: «They will not harm you except for (some) annoyance. »

word: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرّٖۖ
translation: «So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity.»

word: ظَنَّ
translation: to Believe/ Assume

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُواْ رَبِّهِمۡ
translation: «Who are certain that they will meet their Lord »

word: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡ
translation: «And most of them follow not except assumption. Indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.»

word: عَدَّ
translation: to Count

word: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا
translation: «So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a (limited) number»

word: وَقَالُواْ لَن تَمَسَّنَا ٱلنَّارُ إِلَّآ أَيَّامٗا مَّعۡدُودَةٗۚ
translation: «And they say, “Never will the Fire touch us, except for a few days.”»

word: مَدَّ
translation: to Prolong

word: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا
translation: «No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively»

word: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ
translation: «But their brothers - the devils increase them in error; then they do not stop short»

word: ضَلَّ
translation: to Go astray

word: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ مَنۡ أَنَابَ
translation: Say, (O Muhammad), “Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back (to Him)»

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَٰرَتُهُمۡ
translation: «Those are the ones who have purchased error (in exchange) for guidance, so their transaction has brought no profit,»

word: غَرَّ
translation: to Be deluded

word: إِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ غَرَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ دِينُهُمۡۗ
translation: «(Remember) when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts was disease said, “Their religion has deluded those (Muslims).”»

word: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَنِّيهِمۡۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا
translation: «Satan promises them and arouses desire in them. But Satan does not promise them except delusion»

word: مَسَّ
translation: to Touch

word: وَقَالُواْ لَن تَمَسَّنَا ٱلنَّارُ إِلَّآ أَيَّامٗا مَّعۡدُودَةٗۚ
translation: «And they say, “Never will the Fire touch us, except for a few days.”»

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَٰٓئِفٞ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُواْ
translation: «Indeed, those who fear Allah - when an impulse touches them from Satan, they remember (Him)»

word: وَدَّ
translation: to Wish

word: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
translation: «Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims»

word: وَدُّواْ لَوۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ كَمَا كَفَرُواْ فَتَكُونُونَ سَوَآءٗۖ
translation: «They wish you would disbelieve as they disbelieved so you would be alike.»

word: سَأَلَ
translation: to Ask

word: سَأَلَ سَآئِلُۢ بِعَذَابٖ وَاقِعٖ
translation: «A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen»

word: يَسۡ
translation: «They ask you, (O Muhammad), about the new moons.»

word: سَلۡ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ كَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ ءَايَةِۢ بَيِّنَةٖۗ
translation: ««Ask the Children of Israel how many a sign of evidence We have given them. »

word: قَرَأَ
translation: to Read

word: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ
translation: «Recite in the name of your Lord who created»

word: فَسۡ
translation: «then ask those who have been reading the Scripture before you.»

word: أَخَذَ
translation: to Take/ Seize

word: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ وَرَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمُ ٱلطُّورَ خُذُواْ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكُم بِقُوَّةٖ
translation: «And (recall) when We took your covenant, (O Children of Israel, to abide by the Torah) and We raised over you the mount, (saying), “Take what We have given you with determination»

word: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِين
translation: «Or that He would not seize them during their (usual) activity, and they could not cause failure?»

word: أَكَلَ
translation: to Eat/ Consume

word: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
translation: «Then he turned to their gods and said, “Do you not eat?»

word: كُلُواْ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا رَزَقۡنَٰكُمۡۚ
translation: «“Eat from the good things with which We have provided you.”»

word: قَالُواْ نُرِيدُ أَن نَّأۡكُلَ مِنۡهَا وَتَطۡمَئِنَّ قُلُوبُنَا وَنَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ صَدَقۡتَنَا
translation: «They said, “We wish to eat from it and let our hearts be reassured and know that you have been truthful to us.»

word: أَمَرَ
translation: to Order/ Command

word: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأۡمُرُكُمۡ أَن تَذۡبَحُواْ بَقَرَةٗۖ
translation: «And (recall) when Moses said to his people, “Indeed, Allah commands you to slaughter a cow.”»

word: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
translation: «Say, (O Muhammad), “Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, (being) sincere to Him in religion»

word: أمِنَ
translation: to Feel Safe

word: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتٗا وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ
translation: «Then, did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them at night while they were asleep?»

word: رَأَى
translation: to See

word: وَلَوۡ يَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِذۡ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ أَنَّ ٱلۡقُوَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعٗا
translation: «And if only they who have wronged would consider (that) when they see the punishment»

word: أَتَى
translation: to Come/ Bring

word: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
translation: «And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him»

word: ٱئۡتُونِي بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ أَثَٰرَةٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
translation: «Bring me a scripture (revealed) before this or a (remaining) trace of knowledge, if you should be truthful.”»

word: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
translation: «The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him»

word: شَاءَ
translation: to Will

word: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَأٓمَنَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ أ
translation: «And had your Lord willed, those on earth would have believed - all of them entirely.»

word: ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۚ
translation: «That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whomever He wills of His servants.»

word: سَاءَ
translation: to Be evil

word: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِ
translation: «How evil an example (is that of) the people who denied Our signs and used to wrong themselves»

word: إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
translation: «Indeed, it was evil that they were doing»

word: وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
translation: «And (recall) when We saved your forefathers from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with the worst torment, »

word: جَاءَ
translation: to Come

word: قَدۡ جَآءَكُم بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ فَمَنۡ أَبۡصَرَ فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ
translation: «There has come to you enlightenment from your Lord. So whoever will see does so for (the benefit of) his soul»

word: وَرَسُولًا إِلَىٰ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ أَنِّي قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِ
translation: «And (make him) a messenger to the Children of Israel, (who will say), ‘Indeed  I have come to you with a sign from your Lord»

word: وَذَرَ
translation: to Leave behind

word: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
translation: «It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins»

word: وَذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ دِينَهُمۡ لَعِبٗا وَلَهۡوٗا وَغَرَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ
translation: «And leave those who take their religion as amusement and diversion and whom the worldly life has deluded.»

word: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
translation: «Indeed, these (disbelievers) love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day»

word: وَضَعَ
translation: to Place/ give birth

word: فَلَمَّا وَضَعَتۡهَا قَالَتۡ رَبِّ إِنِّي وَضَعۡتُهَآ أُنثَىٰ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا وَضَعَتۡ
translation: «But when she delivered her, she said, “My Lord, I have delivered a female.” And Allah was most knowing of what she delivered”»

word: وَوُضِعَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ فَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ مُشۡفِقِينَ مِمَّا فِيهِ
translation: «And the record (of deeds) will be placed (open), and you will see the criminals fearful of that within it»

word: وَقَعَ
translation: to Befall/ Happen

word: إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلۡوَاقِعَةُ
translation: «When the Occurrence occurs»

word: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
translation: «So the truth was established, and abolished was what they were doing»

word: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
translation: «And the decree will befall them for the wrong they did, and they will not (be able to) speak»

word: وَهَبَ
translation: to Grant

word: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا
translation: «And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet»

word: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
translation: «My Lord, grant me (a child) from among the righteous.”»

word: وَجَدَ
translation: to Find

word: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
translation: «And We found not within them other than a (single) house of Muslims»

word: إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَٰهُ صَابِرٗاۚ نِّعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٞ
translation: «Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back (to Allah)»

word: وَإِن كُنتُمۡ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٖ وَلَمۡ تَجِدُواْ كَاتِبٗا فَرِهَٰنٞ مَّقۡبُوضَةٞۖ
translation: «And if you are on a journey and cannot find a scribe, then a security deposit (should be) taken.»

word: وَرِثَ
translation: to Inherit

word: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ دَاوُۥدَۖ
translation: «And Solomon inherited David.»

word: أَوَ لَمۡ يَهۡدِ لِلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَهۡلِهَآ
translation: «Has it not become clear to those who inherited the earth after its (previous) people»

word: وَعَدَ
translation: to Promise

word: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَنِّيهِمۡۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا
translation: «Satan promises them and arouses desire in them. But Satan does not promise them except delusion»

word: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ
translation: «Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds (that) for them there is forgiveness and great reward»

word: وَقَىَ
translation: to Protect

word: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
translation: «So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness»

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
translation: «Those who say, “Our Lord, indeed we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire,”»

word: وَسِعَ
translation: to Encompass

word: وَرَحۡمَتِي وَسِعَتۡ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖۚ
translation: «But My mercy encompasses all things.»

word: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمٗا
translation: «Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge.”»

word: قَالَ
translation: to Say

word: قُلۡ مَنۡ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ وَٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلرِّزۡقِۚ
translation: Say, “Who has forbidden the adornment of Allah which He has produced for His servants and the good (lawful) things of provision?”

word: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ
translation: «And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear (Allah).”»

word: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٞ
translation: «A speaker among them will say, “Indeed, I had a companion (on earth)»

word: كَانَ
translation: to Be

word: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡ
translation: «His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, “Be,” and it is»

word: وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا
translation: «And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise»

word: تَابَ
translation: to Repent

word: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَهُۥۚ
translation: «So will they not repent to Allah and seek His forgiveness?»

word: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ
translation: «Then Adam received from his Lord (some) words, and He accepted his repentance.»

word: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا
translation: «And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with (accepted) repentance»

word: فَازَ
translation: to Attain

word: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَقَدۡ فَازَ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمًا
translation: «And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly attained a great attainment»

word: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
translation: «Indeed, this is the great attainment»

word: مَاتَ
translation: to Die

word: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
translation: «Neither dying therein nor living»

word: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِجۡسًا إِلَىٰ رِجۡسِهِمۡ  وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كَـٰفِرُونَ
translation: «But as for those in whose hearts is disease, it has (only) increased them in evil (in addition) to their evil. And they will have died while they are disbelievers»

word: خَافَ
translation: to Fear

word: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
translation: «And O my people, indeed I fear for you the Day of Calling»

word: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ
translation: «They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded»

word: زَادَ
translation: to Increase

word: فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضٗاۖ
translation: «In their hearts is disease, so Allah has increased their disease»

word: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ
translation: «And We sent him to (his people of) a hundred thousand or more»

word: كَادَ
translation: to almost ...

word: يَكَادُ ٱلۡبَرۡقُ يَخۡطَفُ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡۖ
translation: «The lightning almost snatches away their sight.»

word: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخۡفِيهَا لِتُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۢ بِمَا تَسۡعَىٰ
translation: «Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives»

word: يَكَادُونَ يَسۡطُونَ بِٱلَّذِينَ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَاۗ
translation: «They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses.»

word: كَادَ
translation: to Plot against

word: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا
translation: «Indeed, they are planning a plan»

word: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا
translation: «But I am planning a plan»

word: قَالَ يَٰبُنَيَّ لَا تَقۡصُصۡ رُءۡيَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ إِخۡوَتِكَ فَيَكِيدُواْ لَكَ كَيۡدًاۖ
translation: «He said, “O my son, do not relate your vision to your brothers or they will contrive against you a plan.»

word: تَلَا
translation: to Recite

word: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَتۡلُونَهُۥ حَقَّ تِلَاوَتِهِ
translation: «Those to whom We have given the Book recite it with its true recital.»

word: قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ فَٱتۡلُوهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
translation: «“So bring the Torah and recite it, if you should be truthful.”»

word: وَكَيۡفَ تَكۡفُرُونَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ وَفِيكُمۡ رَسُولُهُ
translation: «And how could you disbelieve while to you are being recited the verses of Allah and among you is His Messenger?»

word: دَعَا
translation: to Call/ Pray/ Do dua’

word: وَٱدۡعُوهُ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَۚ
translation: «And invoke Him, sincere to Him in religion.”»

word: إِن يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَٰثٗا وَإِن يَدۡعُونَ إِلَّا شَيۡطَٰنٗا مَّرِيدٗا
translation: «They call upon instead of Him none but female (deities), and they (actually) call upon none but a rebellious Satan»

word: عَفَا
translation: to Forgo

word: وَجَزَٰٓؤُاْ سَيِّئَةٖ سَيِّئَةٞ مِّثۡلُهَاۖ فَمَنۡ عَفَا وَأَصۡلَحَ فَأَجۡرُهُۥ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ
translation: «And the retribution for an evil act is an evil one like it, but whoever pardons and makes reconciliation - his reward is (due) from Allah.»

word: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡۚ
translation: «For those it is expected that Allah will pardon them»

word: ثُمَّ عَفَوۡنَا عَنكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
translation: «Then We forgave you after that so perhaps you would be grateful»

word: بَغَى
translation: to Desire/ Want

word: أَفَغَيۡرَ دِينِ ٱللَّهِ يَبۡغُونَ
translation: «So is it other than the religion of Allah they desire»

word: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ كَٰفِرُونَ
translation: «Who averted (people) from the way of Allah and sought to make it (seem) deviant while they were, concerning the Hereafter, disbelievers»

word: بَغَى
translation: to Transgress

word: فَمَنِ ٱضۡطُرَّ غَيۡرَ بَاغٖ وَلَا عَادٖ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِۚ
translation: «But whoever is forced (by necessity), neither desiring (it) nor transgressing (its limit), there is no sin upon him.»

word: إِنَّ قَٰرُونَ كَانَ مِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰ فَبَغَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ
translation: «Indeed, Qarun was from the people of Moses, but he tyrannized them.»

word: جَرَى
translation: to Flow

word: وَنَزَعۡنَا مَا فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنۡ غِلّٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ
translation: «And We will have removed whatever is within their breasts of resentment, (while) flowing beneath them are rivers.»

word: فِيهِمَا عَيۡنَانِ تَجۡرِيَانِ
translation: «In both of them are two springs, flowing»

word: جَزَى
translation: to Reward

word: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
translation: «So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account»

word: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۢ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ
translation: «This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today!

word: قَضَى
translation: to Decree

word: وَإِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
translation: «When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, “Be,” and it is»

word: وَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُقۡضَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَحۡيُهُۥۖ
translation: «do not hasten with (recitation of) the Qur’an before its revelation is completed to you,»

word: وَٱللَّهُ يَقۡضِي بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقۡضُونَ بِشَيۡءٍۗ
translation: «And Allah judges with truth, while those they invoke besides Him judge not with anything.»

word: كَفَى
translation: to Suffice

word: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا
translation: «And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs»

word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا
translation: «That is the bounty from Allah, and sufficient is Allah as Knower»

word: هَدَى
translation: to Guide

word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: «This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah»

word: ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۚ
translation: «That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whomever He wills of His servants.»

word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَى ٱللَّهُۖ فَبِهُدَىٰهُمُ ٱقۡتَدِهۡۗ
translation: «Those are the ones whom Allah has guided, so from their guidance take an example.»

word: خَشَى
translation: to Fear

word: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ
translation: «Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning (in repentance)»

word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
translation: «Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward»

word: رَضَى
translation: to Be pleased

word: وَلَن تَرۡضَىٰ عَنكَ ٱلۡيَهُودُ وَلَا ٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ تَتَّبِعَ مِلَّتَهُمۡۗ
translation: «And never will the Jews or the Christians approve of you until you follow their religion.»

word: رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ
translation: «Allah being pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord»

word: نَسِىَ
translation: to Forget

word: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذۡنِي بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرۡهِقۡنِي مِنۡ أَمۡرِي عُسۡرٗا
translation: «(Moses) said, “Do not blame me for what I forgot and do not cover me in my matter with difficulty.”»

word: بَلۡ إِيَّاهُ تَدۡعُونَ فَيَكۡشِفُ مَا تَدۡعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ إِن شَآءَ وَتَنسَوۡنَ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ
translation: «No, it is Him (alone) you would invoke, and He would remove that for which you invoked Him if He willed, and you would forget what you associate (with Him)»

word: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى
translation: «(Moses) said, “The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets.”»
